“You know what?” You began. “I actually think working at a restaurant could be pretty cool! There’s something special about the feeling of making something for someone, and seeing them enjoy it.”

Though you hadn’t thought it possible, Mariah’s face radiated even more beauty, as her plump lips curled into a huge smile. “That’s exactly right, cutie! That’s the passion of being a chef!” She laughed heartily. “You and I are going to get along splendidly, aren’t we?”

A faint flash of rejection passed in Lilyana’s icy blue eyes, but it was replaced quickly with affection towards her spouse. “Well, I know that you’ll be a perfect fit at my sweetheart’s restaurant. They treat everyone like family there.”

Mariah beamed proudly. “The Sinclair Sandwiches motto: scrumptious sandwiches and satisfied smiles!”

Avery’s head bobbled up and down energetically. “OMG, this is way too cool! My new adorable roomie working at my mom’s restaurant. I totes need you to whip up a special little burger for me sometime, once you’re a master!” The pink-haired girl winked at you.

“It’s a good opportunity, huh, Hunter?” Morgan asked. “You can trust my mom to treat you well and pay you fairly. Plus, the three of us can drop by and visit often!” She glanced at Quinn. “Er…not to impose, Quinn.”

Your apathetic roommate shook her head, the faintest smile playing at the corners of her lips. “No problem. I actually kinda like burgers…I guess.”

Mariah clapped her hands together. “Then it’s decided! You can start tomorrow, cutie! Don’t worry, I know you’ll fit right in!” She leaned over you and extended her thumb as a sign of an unstated work relationship beginning.

Admittedly, it was a struggle for you to tear your gaze from the woman’s abundant cleavage, which was on full display as she bent over you. Her chest was massive, approximately the size of Quinn’s unbelievably bountiful breasts, and Mariah’s low-cut blouse left little to the imagination. The abyss of her cleavage practically beckoned you, her skin looking heavenly smooth and soft. It wasn’t hard to see where Avery and Morgan got their killer looks from.

After a long moment, though, you tore your gaze away and grasped Mariah’s entire thumb with your hands, shaking it up and down with a smile. Mariah laughed, her eyes sparkling.

“Welcome to the Sinclair Sandwiches staff, little man!” She grinned pleasantly.

*****

The evening wasn’t entirely uneventful, but that was to be expected in your hectic, accident-prone life. Lilyana stepped on you twice while walking back and forth between the living room and the kitchen, and Mariah plopped her shapely booty onto you because she’d forgotten which seat you had taken, resulting in you spending nearly an hour squished under her thick derriere. Still, it could’ve’ been worse. Each woman apologized…though you couldn’t help but see a flash of something more in their eyes each time they discovered you and realized their blunder. They eventually left, with Mariah promising to swing by in the morning and pick you up for your first day of work.

*****

The next morning, Morgan woke you up and fixed you breakfast, and afterwards you cleaned yourself up and changed into fresh clothes. Mariah arrived a few minutes later than she had stated, bustling inside with a energetic attitude and a giggly apology to Morgan for being late. In her haste, she spared no backwards look at the couch (which is where you were waiting for her to notice you), and instead began to sit down atop you.

“Mrs. Sinclair, wait!” You cried out, madly dashing to the side to avoid the meteoric impact of Mariah’s hefty ass crashing onto the couch. Surprisingly, the curvaceous giantess actually heard you, but fate still screwed you over anyway.

“Oh goodness, are you under me, little cutie?” Mariah inquired aloud. Wanting to be cautious, the giantess woman shifted over a foot, and plopped down onto the other couch cushion instead. Of course, in your efforts to escape her falling butt, that’s the exact same couch cushion you had attempted to escape to. Now, all you’d done is slightly change the location of the inevitable, and you crumpled to paper under Mariah’s plump booty.

Thankfully, it took Mariah only a few minutes to recognize what she’d done, and she soon had you peeled off her buttcheek and reforming in her palm. “So sorry about that, cutie. I thought I moved out of your way, but I guess I moved INTO it, huh? Gosh, it must be hard for you tinies, huh?”

Once reformed, you stood up and waved confidently to Mariah. “No, it’s nothing, boss! I can handle it!”

Mariah laughed, a twinkle in her eyes. “Is that so? You’re gonna be a little trooper, aren’t you. That’s so adorable!” She titled her hand suddenly, catching you off guard, but you quickly realized she was simply depositing you into her purse. “Stay safe in there, hun, and I’ll take you back out when we get to the restaurant. It isn’t too far.”

Waiting until you got comfortable, Mariah flashed you a wink, said goodbye to Morgan, and strolled out of the apartment. She set her purse down in the passenger’s seat of her car and drove off to Sinclair Sandwiches. True to her word, the drive wasn’t much longer than fifteen minutes or so, and Mariah spent the entire time singing, her melodious voice enthralling. It was genuinely a pretty soothing car ride.

Once at the restaurant, Mariah began heading inside, and you took the opportunity to climb onto the edge of her purse and peer at the restaurant. From the outside, it wasn’t much, but it did have that ‘local family-owned business’ feeling to it. Just looking at the building made you feel warm and fuzzy, and a bit nostalgic. You weren’t a professional designer, but there was definitely something in the construction of the place that made you feel happy.

The inside of the restaurant was even better. Pastel colors and happy clouds and sunshine decorations lined the walls and the ceiling. The irresistible aroma of freshly cooked burgers wafted through the air. A few ceiling fans spun slowly, generating a cool breeze and pushing the burger scent all through the restaurant. Soft jazz music played from a few speakers. It was just so overwhelmingly friendly and homey of an atmosphere you couldn’t help but smile.

However, in your dazed stupor, you didn’t realize Mariah was sauntering so close to the counter as she walked briskly into the kitchen. Nor did you realize just how close to the lip of her purse you’d climbed to get a better look. In the blink of an eye, Mariah lightly bumped her hip into the counter, let out a short gasp of surprise, and utterly failed to notice as your miniscule body flipped up and out of the purse and onto the counter.

You flopped and rolled to a stop, sitting up groggily and watching Mariah carry on further into the kitchen, towards a door in the back that was presumably a small office. You cursed your inattentiveness, as you were now effectively stuck her on the front counter until she came back for you, as it’d take you nearly ten minutes to walk to her office on your own.

“Uh…ew, gross.” A voice behind you said, the tone cold and disgusted. Whipping your head around, you found yourself staring at the pronounced chest of a towering giantess. She was wearing a bright pink and cheery restaurant uniform that was maybe a size too small, as it hugged her noticeably large breasts quite tightly, and two of the blouse’s front buttons were strained to the seam, revealing a bit of her cleavage underneath.

Tearing your eyes up to the girl’s face, you saw a pretty, angular face framed by dark brown hair with a streak of blue, pale white skin, and angry hazel eyes. The girl’s expression was one of utter disgust, her nose crinkled up and her lips pulled back in a sneer.

“Um…hello! I’m the new employee here! My name is Hunter, and–” You began your introduction, but a loud scoff from the girl cut you off.

“God, who let a tiny in here? Freakin’ bugs.” The girl rolled her eyes and raised her clenched fist above your body. “See you later, bug!”

“What? Wait! WAIT!” You screamed, pathetically shielding yourself from the girl’s sudden attack.

Thankfully, your savior came through. Mariah appeared suddenly, catching the girl’s hand. “Wait, Phoebe! That isn’t a bug, it’s our new adorable employee.”

The girl pulled her hand back from Mariah and frowned, eyeing you with contempt. “You seriously hired a tiny?”

Mariah pouted. “I know you find them a bit…weird…but try to like this one! He’ll be a great addition to the team, I promise!”
Phoebe brushed a strand of hair out of her eyes and glared at you. After a moment, cruel mischief danced in her eyes, and she smiled slightly. “Yeah…maybe he will be fun.”

Mariah, oblivious to Phoebe’s intentions, clapped her hands excitedly. “Oh, this is amazing. You and I will have to teach this cutie everything we know about working here, and soon, he’ll be a perfect employee!” Mariah looked down at you and beamed. “Ready to get started?”

Tearing your eyes from Phoebe, who was still smiling eerily at you, you nodded shakily. Uh…yep! Let’s do this!”

Spending the night at Mariah and Lilyana’s

112321.content:
Mariah plucked you up between two fingers before depositing you in the palm of her other hand.
“Alright, little cutie, let’s show you around. Get you used to where you’ll be working,” she seemed excited to have you on board. The same could not be said for Phoebe, who was still giving you looks of disgust and also wanting to mess with you.
Mariah briskly walked into the kitchen, where you could see several people were already busy getting everything ready for opening.
“Ok little guy, this is the kitchen. I think we’ll start you off in here today, but we can get to that in a little bit. Say hi to your cute new coworker ladies,” as she said this, the kitchen staff paused what they were doing to look at you and when they saw you they all waved. Some said hello, others remarked at how cute they found you. At least everyone back here seemed nice.
With that she moved through a side door into a small room with a few couches, a coffee table, and a countertop with a microwave and a coffee pot. It looked well decorated and cozy.
“This is the break room, I tried to make it as cozy as possible. I’ll also see if I can get some stuff appropriate for your size on the counter top. Wouldn’t want a cute little thing like yourself to have to share the couch with us big girls,” she looked down at you with a warm expression. You appreciated the lengths she seemed to be going to to make your time working here easy. Although the way she seemed to fuss over you was a little embarrassing.
Finally Mariah walked through a door on the other side of the break room, leading into a small office space with two desks. You could see one of them, which was very disorganised and untidy, had a picture of Mariah and her family, pretty much giving away that this was her desk. The other was more organised, but was covered in various documents and invoices, however it was currently empty, it’s occupant wasn’t here yet.
“This is Stefanie’s, our accountant, and my office. I’m not in here very much, paperwork’s not really my thing. I prefer to be in the kitchen making delicious food!” You could tell from the way that Mariah excitedly talked about her job that she loved it very much.
“So, it’ll take a few days for us to get you a uniform, we’ve never had a little cutie like yourself before so we don’t have any uniforms that’ll fit you. For today I think the best thing is for you to be my adorable little assistant in the kitchen. We can maybe get you to do customer service another day, I’m sure a little thing like yourself would be very popular with our customers but to start you off I think kitchen experience is better,” you nodded as Mariah finished explaining things to you and she smiled warmly in return.
“Sounds good to me boss,” you replied with confidence. In truth however you were incredibly nervous. A kitchen could be a dangerous place for someone your size, but you didn’t want to disappoint your new boss on the first day, or Morgan and Avery for that matter either, they seemed pretty excited for you to work with their mom.
With the tour over with Mariah sets you down on her desk. You try not to move too far just in case she loses you amongst all the stuff on her desk. After setting you down she went to grab her apron and started to look for her hairnet but after a few minutes of looking she let out a frustrated sigh.
“Where is my hairnet, I’m sure I left it in this office before I left last night. What am I going to do, I can’t cook with my hair down like this, I need to find something to hold my hair back,” as she said this her eyes drifted to you with a pleading look that worried you. “Hey little guy, I need to ask you for a huge favour, I can’t seem to find my hairnet, and I can’t cook with my hair down like this. Would you be fine with me using you as a hair band for today, we can get to training you tomorrow?”
As you looked up at her warm, smiling face you struggled to find a reason to say no. Her low cut top displaying her abundant cleavage also distracted you from thinking of any reasons to say no.
“Y-yeah sure, whatever you need, boss,” you sheepishly smiled up to her, dreading this shift now that you were going to have to spend it as an object.
“Yay, oh thank you so much you little cutie. I don’t know what I would have done without ya!” Her relieved expression eased your apprehension about this situation, she wasn’t doing this out of maliciousness, just that she needed help. Plus she was your boss so helping her out with this favour could only be a good thing, right?
After thanking you, Mariah quickly picked you up and began to stretch you out, before pulling her hair back into a bun and wrapping you around it, holding it in place.
“Thanks so much little guy, just hold out till the end of the shift and then I’ll let you out ok?” With that, Mariah quickly strode out into the kitchen.
The rest of the day went by fairly uneventfully, you served as Mariah’s hair tie well while she prepared countless delicious meals, all the while she was happily humming a song when she wasn’t communicating with her staff. Her hair smelled fruity from the shampoo she must have washed it with, although towards the end the smell of grease and burgers began to overtake it. Other than that it was kind of boring. Mariah acknowledged you every now and then, asking how you were doing before realising you couldn’t talk in your stretched out form and giggling to herself for her silliness.
Eventually the day came to an end and, after serving her last burger of the day, Mariah went back into her office and took off her apron and then you. She smiled down at you, easing your fear that she may have forgotten you.
“You did great little guy. Tomorrow I think we’ll get you to do some stuff in the kitchen though, I don’t think you signed up to be my hair tie, but if you ever feel like a career change you’re pretty good at it,” she laughed at her own joke. “Anyway they’ll be almost ready to close up shop, let’s get out of here, little guy.”

1) Mariah drives you home and says she’ll be back tomorrow to pick you up again at the same time.
2) Tomorrow is the day for giving the kitchen a deep clean before opening so you and Mariah will need to be in early, so she takes you home to spend the night with her and Lilyana.
3) She asks Phoebe to take you home as she has somewhere else to be. Will Phoebe take you home?

Mariah picked up your stretched out, slowly recovering form and left the restaurant. After locking up and saying goodbye to her staff, Mariah sauntered off towards her car. Looking down at your body, almost fully reformed, she smiled down at you.
“You’re probably wondering why we closed so soon after the dinner rush tonight,” as she said this you looked up, seeing that it was still fairly light out, you’d guess it was only around 6pm. “It’s to give my staff an early finish on a Wednesday, because tomorrow morning we need to be in bright and early for the kitchen’s weekly deep clean, stuff that we just don’t have time to do at closing or opening normally. So, so that we don’t wake my daughters and Quinn up super early tomorrow, it’s probably a good idea for you to sleep at mine and Lilyana’s place tonight, that sound good to you?”

You, now fully reformed in your new boss’s hand, thought for a moment. As much as you thought it would be a bit strange staying in the house of your new boss who you only just met yesterday, it would be more considerate for your new roommates if you avoided waking them up really early tomorrow. With your mind made up you looked back up to Mariah.
“Sure thing boss, sounds good to me, as long as it’s not an issue for you and Lilyana?”

“As that’s sweet of you to check it’s fine but I’m sure Lilyana would love to have a little cute thing like yourself around!” Mariah calling you a “thing” was a little insulting but you decided to let it slide, you didn’t want to get on your boss’ bad side on your first day. Happy with your agreement, Mariah sent a text to Morgan to let her know you wouldn’t be home tonight.

Mariah deposited you back into her purse, got in her car and started to drive home. The car journey was relatively quick, and before long you felt the purse being picked up once more, swaying slightly with every step Mariah took towards her house. You heard the sound of a door opening and then saw the purse open as Mariah plucked you out and deposited you in her open palm.
“Babe I’m home, and we’ve got a little lodger for tonight!” Mariah squealed out, clearly excited to have you staying with them tonight. As she shouted out you got a look at the hall of the fairly large house that Mariah and Lilyana lived in, it was beautifully decorated and spacious.
Lilyana quickly strode out from the living room on your left, wearing a professional grey dress and nothing on her feet, glancing down at the floor you saw a pair of high heels sat near the door, obviously Lilyana had just recently got home as well. Lilyana’s angelic face beamed a radiant smile when she saw her wife, which seemed to grow even wider when she spotted you standing on her wife’s palm.

“Ah, my beautiful wife is home, and she brought a cute little man with her! How was your first day at your new job, little man?” Lilyana approached as she said this. Now standing in front of her wife, who held you at around chest height, Lilyana towered high above you. Before you could answer Lilyana leaned forward and planted a kiss on Mariah’s lips, leaning on the hand that was holding you and smushing you under her modest, yet still large enough to crush you, breasts. As Lilyana pulled back, both women looked down to Mariah’s hand and saw you laying on it, flattened. Both women started to giggle, finding Lilyana’s unintentional crushing of you hilarious.

“I guess the little guy’s a bit to flat to talk right now, so I’ll tell you. He didn’t get a whole lot of training today because he was nice enough to fill in as my hair tie, since I think I left my hairnet here, it was so sweet of the little cutie. I don’t know what I would have done without him,” you felt yourself blush slightly at Mariah’s praise.
“Really, so the little man is happy to be turned into useful things, yes?” Lilyana seemed to be directing this question to Mariah instead of you, which you found strange. You definitely wouldn’t want to get turned into “useful things” if you could help it, but you were too flat to voice that right now.
“Seems to be, yeah. I think he’s just happy to be helpful, the sweet little cutie that he is. Hopefully tomorrow I won’t forget anything and he’ll get some actual training in the kitchen, but I think he’ll definitely be helpful with the weekly deep clean tomorrow,” the two women walked into the living room as they talked, Mariah deposited your flattened form on a tan, cushioned footrest. You were slightly concerned at the colour of your current resting place, but then you looked around and realised with fear that all of the seating in this living room was tan. You just hoped your clothes would hold up through any further squishing you would receive tonight, otherwise being found would likely become an issue.

While you reformed, the two women caught up about their days. Once you finally popped back into shape, Mariah turned to you.
“I’m just gonna go fix dinner. You two stay here and relax,” with that Mariah sauntered off to the kitchen, wide hips swaying as she went.

As you were distracted watching Mariah leave, you felt two heavy thuds a few inches from your position. The cushion of the footrest indented slightly towards the two heavy objects that had landed close to you, causing you to stumble and have to catch yourself to avoid falling over. Turning around you were greeted with the pale soles of Lilyana, who had propped them up on the footrest, not really thinking about the fact that you were also occupying it. Her soles looked soft and well cared for, with a slight layer of sweat on them from wearing her heels all day. Her well pedicured toes stood high above you, you could see her toenails were painted with a deep ocean blue nail polish. Even Lilyana’s feet were a vision of beauty. After taking in the intimidating view of her feet so close to you, they parted slightly and you could see Lilyana smiling at you from what seemed like, from your perspective, a great distance away. Her beautiful face radiating a friendly smile towards you.
“Watch out little one, if you are not careful then you could get smushed under my foots,” she let out a giggle, wiggling her toes playfully. “In fact, you got squashed twice by them yesterday, I could begin to think you enjoy them!”
You could tell that she was joking, you hoped. You nervously laughed in response, “heh, yeah Mrs Sinclair. I’ll be more careful in the future.”

You and Lilyana talked for a few more minutes before Mariah returned from the kitchen.
“Dinner’s on, it’ll be half an hour or so, so we can just sit and watch some TV till it’s ready,” as Mariah walked past the footrest her shin bumped into it, hitting it hard enough to send you flying off it to the floor. You yet out a yelp as you hit the carpeted floor, but it was cushioned enough that you didn’t flatten very much when you hit it, reforming in a few seconds.
Mariah didn’t seem to hear your cry of surprise, but Lilyana did. Her full lips pulled into a playful grin as she saw you on the floor.
You looked up to see one of Lilyana’s pristine feet descend towards you. Fully expecting to be crushed, you cried out to her to stop, but you were surprised when two of her toes clamped delicately around your body. Between her big and second toes, you smelled a fruity lotion that she must use to clean them, masking a faint hint of sweat. Lilyana carefully lifted you back up onto the footrest using her foot, depositing you back on the footrest safe and unsquished. She smiled down at you, giving you a gentle pat on the head with her big toe before giggling and placing her foot back where it was before. You were surprised at Lilyana’s dexterity with her feet, she didn’t even squish you at all!

The next twenty minutes went without incident, as you sat in front of Lilyana’s feet you all watched a sitcom about a tiny guy getting into various incidents with the unaware women in his life. You didn’t find it particularly funny but Mariah and Lilyana found it hilarious. When the show reached a commercial break you felt the weight on the footrest behind you shift as Lilyana parted her feet to look at you again.

“Hey, little one. Would you be happy to do me a small favour?” you could see a small mischievous glint in her eyes that made you slightly uneasy about what she would ask. You glanced over to Mariah to see that she seemed to be awaiting your answer. Not wanting to disappoint your new boss, you opened your mouth to speak.
“S-sure Mrs Sinclair, what can I help you with?” you stammered out your answer, which both women seemed to find cute based off their giggles that followed it. Lilyana opened her mouth to voice her request...

1) “Since you and my feet seem to be becoming fast-friends, would you mind giving them a small massage? I was wearing uncomfortable shoes all day and they are hurting very much.”
2) “I have a pair of knee high boots that my darling Mariah thinks I look very nice in, but I cannot wear them because there is a tiny thing in it that I cannot see and is very annoying. If you could get it out I would have much appreciation.”
3) “Could you help my darling Mariah in the kitchen? She does not ask me to help because I am not very good with the cooking.”
1123212.title: Mariah and Lilyana’s House

Mariah is disappointed
Mariah intervenes
112323.content:
“Alright little guy. I think the best thing to do on your first day is to get you familiar with working the register. Customer service will be a big part of your job here so I think we’d be best to get that part first. I just know a little cutie like yourself will be popular with our customers!” Mariah’s smile beamed down at you and you couldn’t help but smile in return, Mariah’s energy and love for her job was infectious.

“Sounds good to me boss!” Your smile faltered slightly when you looked to Mariah’s right and saw Phoebe eying you maliciously.
Seeing your gaze drawn to Phoebe, but not the fear behind it, Mariah turned to your new coworker.
“I think since our cute new employee will be manning the register with me overseeing him, you should probably work in the kitchen for today Phoebe,” Mariah smiled to her employee, clearly unaware of the younger woman’s desire to hurt you.

“No problem Mariah, I prefer kitchen duty anyway,” Phoebe looked momentarily disappointed that she wouldn’t be able to mess with you, before walking off to the kitchen.

“Phoebe is one of my best workers, I think you two will get along swimmingly!” Looking up at Mariah’s face, blissfully unaware of Phoebes attitude towards her, you doubted that very much.

Mariah carried you over to the register and placed you down next to it. As she walked the short distance, she started speaking to you.
“Alright little guy, I know you’re probably thinking that there’s not much you could do with a register since it’s so much bigger than you, well you’re in luck! We just got a new register system a few weeks ago, and they’re touch screens! We can just lay the tablet down on the counter and you can just jump on the buttons to take peoples orders, isn’t that cool?”

“But Mrs Sinclair, how will I take peoples money?” You were concerned on how effectively you’d be able to do this part of the job just based off of handling normal sized money.

“Aw don’t worry cutie. Most people play using a card or their phone anyway, but if you do get cash, just press this button on the screen,” as she said this and pressed the button she was referring to, a drawer popped out from the counter behind you, looking over the edge it was maybe a 2 inch drop inch drop down there, and enough footholds in the counter for you to climb back up out of it. “Once that’s open you can just drop the money in there, and there’s another button here to close it. Neat, huh?”

Most of Mariah’s statements eased your concerns slightly, and to be honest you were probably safer out here than in the kitchen. Any number of accidents could happen in there. You shuddered at the thought of getting trapped in a burger and served to an unaware customer, which was especially likely with Phoebe working in the kitchen as well.

“Sounds all good to me boss!” You joked by giving a salute, which caused Mariah to giggle.
“I think you’ll be a wonderful addition to the Sinclair Sandwiches Team!”

Mariah picked you up and took you through to her back office to get your contract signed and order you a uniform that would fit you. In the meantime you had been asked to wear some clothes that matched the colours of the restaurant so you could be identified as staff.

“Alright little guy, let’s go take some people’s orders! All you have to remember that the customer’s experience here is the most important thing, we pride ourselves on our friendly and helpful staff. So as long as you remember that you’ll do great.”
You nodded as Mariah picked you up to take you out front to start your shift.

*****

You had been working at the register for the last three hours and it was going well. Every customer was being nice or at least patient with you, recognising that you would be a bit slower than their usual cashiers. Many women fawned over how cute you were, which made you attempt to focus on endearing their orders on the screen to hide your embarrassment.
This was often helped by Mariah, who’s friendly and exuberant personality took some of each customer’s attention off of you. Although a lot of their conversations revolved around how adorable the women found you.

Things had been going smoothly, the morning rush having finished, and there would likely be an hour or so till the lunch rush.

“Alright little guy, I think I’ll take my lunch break now that it’s gotten quiet, after I get back I’ll cover the register so you can get yours,” you started to get a little uneasy at the prospect of being left on your own, and you must have shown it in your expression because Mariah looked at you reassuringly. “Don’t worry cutie, it won’t likely get busy again until after my break’s over.”

Mariah walked through to her office to enjoy her lunch, leaving you to your own devices. There were no customers waiting to be served, so you were left with nothing to do other than look around and watch the customers who were eating. The restaurant wasn’t packed but there were a few tables still occupied, and observing them was one of the few things you could do while you waited for something else to do.

As you were looking around the seating area your eyes fell on a family consisting of a mother and two preteen girls. The girls were being incredibly loud and it appeared to be bothering some of the other customers, but the mother seemed disinterested, as she was absorbed by her phone.
You watched as she, after tucking her phone into her bra, peeled back the top of her burger, removed the two pieces of bacon on the bun and ate them. She glanced around the restaurant and, convinced no ones as seen what she had done, got up and walked towards you, hamburger in hand.

As she approached, you took in her appearance. She was tall, you’d guess maybe six feet tall, and her made-up, slightly snub-nosed face was framed by a soccer mom styled blonde hair. She was wearing a low cut, dark grey T-shirt and a pair of tight jeans. Her generous breasts strained against the T-shirt, stretching the deep v-cut neckline to be more open than it should have been. Her tight jeans hugged her wide hips tightly, and based off of the looks you could see the male customers giving her as she walked by, her behind was as blessed as her bust was. Her T-shirt didn’t go all the way down to her jeans, and in the gap in between them you could see a midriff that was just slightly further than what could be considered pudgy, her fairly prominent muffin top peeking over the rim of her jeans.

She approached the counter with a mean look on her face that told you she was going to be trouble. She finally came to a stop as close to the counter as he could, her massive breasts leaving you in their shadow in a way that was very intimidating to someone of your size. You saw her forehead and eyes come into view as she looked down at you past her bust without bending over at all.
“Excuse me, I asked for bacon on this burger and there’s none on it. I want a refund.”

You looked up into the eyes of this gigantic woman looming over you, as she looked down on you with a sense of entitlement. It was obvious that she was simply doing this to get a free meal, and whether it was through stubborn stupidity or a loyalty to your new place of work, you decided to call her out on it.
“I’m sorry miss, but I just watched you take the bacon off yourself before you walked over here. I know there was bacon on your burger,” you felt good telling this entitled woman no. It’s likely that most people didn’t have the courage to stand up to her, reinforcing this behaviour.

As you refused her, she leaned down towards the counter, her head now hovering directly over you. As she bent over, her pendulous breasts hanged in front of you, barely restricted by her top and bra that was clearly ill suited for such a heavy load. You couldn’t help but stare at them as they hanged directly in front of you. She seemed to notice your stares.

“As so not just a rude employee, but a pervert as well! Listen here you little shit, there was no bacon and my burger and you are going to give me a refund NOW!” As she raised her voice you couldn’t help but shrink slightly at the forceful personality of this aggressive woman.

“Uh... Uh, Again, I’m sorry miss but I know there was no problem with your order. I can’t help you if there isn’t a problem,” you half pleaded with her, just wanting this situation to be over with. You silently hoped someone would come and support you, but it looked like you were the only person stupid enough to get into an argument with her.

“You bet your ass there’s a problem. Do you bugs have less brainpower as well as less height or something? I. WANT. MY. REFUND! And I’m not leaving until I get it,” she was clearly trying to intimidate you, and it was working. “I mean really, all I wanted to do was ask for a refund on my meal which wasn’t made to my specifications and for my trouble I’ve been objectified and called a liar! Someone really should teach you a lesson about manners!”

You were becoming increasingly worried that if someone didn’t interfere, this woman was going to harm you in some way.

1) No one interferes, so the woman grabs you. She may decide to use you as a replacement for her too small bra, or add you as a topping to her burger.
2) Mariah intervenes, having heard the commotion, and believes the woman. She is very disappointed in you for being rude to a customer.
3) Mariah intervenes, having heard the commotion, and believes you. She handles the rude customer and your shift continues.

113.content:
"I guess since we're all sort of strangers, except for you two..." You said, gesturing to Morgan and Avery. "...we should probably each spend some time hanging out with each other and getting to know one another." You shrugged. "If that doesn't sound too dumb or corny."

Avery enthusiastically shook her head. "No way, cutie! That sounds amazing!"

You gave her a slightly weary thumbs up, and inquired. "Then how about you and I hang out the rest of the day?"

"Sounds totes perfect, Hunter! Hop on!" She said, slapping her open palm down onto the coffee table, nearly squishing you in doing so.

As you climbed up onto Avery's outstretched hand, you caught sight of Morgan's somewhat reserved expression, as well as Quinn's trademark indifference. No doubt Morgan had a few reservations about you hanging out with her airheaded sister, but she smiled again a moment later. Standing up, Morgan offered her hand to Quinn, helping the black-haired giantess to her feet, and then the two girls strolled away into the kitchen, perhaps to talk for a bit while having a snack.

Left alone with Avery, the pink-haired girl looked at you with adoring eyes. "What'cha wanna do, Hunter? Like, any fun ideas?"

You rubbed your chin. "Well, how about we hang out in your room? You finished decorating it, right?"

"Ah! Awesome!" Avery nearly squealed with delight, before sprinting out of her room and up the stairs. For a spilt second, you nearly flew out of her hand, before her palm closed tightly around you, dainty fingers crushing your painfully and flattening you up to your head. You honestly weren't sure if this was any better than flying away, and could only look up uselessly at Avery's sexy, beaming face, as she was holding you too tightly to move. Were you getting in too deep and too fast with her? Hopefully not. Eventually, she reached her bedroom on the second floor.

Avery showed off her room, and it was right in the same ballpark as how you would've guessed. It was relatively organized, but filled to the brim with personal belongings. There were a large number of dressers and drawers for clothes, a sprawling make-up table, and even a full-size mannequin currently wearing a sparkly white dress. There was hardly any free space, and the whole room was colored in a wide assortment of rainbow hues, though mostly bright pinks, blues, and reds.

"Welcome to the totes cute private quarters of Princess Avery!" Avery declared dramatically, adopting a silly posh accent as she spoke. She finished with a flourishing spin, in which you finally slipped out of her grasp and fluttered down onto the corner of her bed, still slightly mushed. You sighed at the ditzyness of your new roommate, and began focusing on reforming, your limbs slowly inflating back to normal. As you reformed, you looked up at Avery finishing her twirl, only for the giantess to then back up towards you and begin to sit.

For the second time in one day, an ass of meteoric proportions descending towards you from above, shadows falling over you. Though not comparable to Quinn's humongous derriere, Avery's was no less succulent nor threatening, most of the girl's tanned, curvy buttocks revealed because of her barely-there booty shorts. You only just had enough time to reform your arms and scramble away, crawling frantically as her booty plopped down onto the bed right where you had been. Even still, her bare thigh caught your right leg, pinning you in place.

"Avery! Hey!" You cried up at her, catching her attention. Glancing down at you, Avery blinked in surprise and then smiled sheepishly.

"Oops! How'd you end up there, cutie?" Avery smirked, grabbing your upper body and yanking you out from under her thigh. She then held you in front of her beautiful face, leaving you to dangle as she kept smiling at you. Your legs reformed, and you wished she'd put you down.

Before you could say so, she spoke first. "So, like, what's the plan, man? Hee hee. We can do whatevs you want, Hunter."

Deciding to drop the issue of being dangled like a doll for the moment, you thought about her question. Apparently, you took too long for her mile-a-minute attitude, because she began rambling again.

"Like, we could pull a prank on someone, that would be so funny!" Avery smirked mischievously. "I always pull pranks on Morgan, but now we've got Quinn to mess with! She seems like a totes tough nut to crack, so we need to be uber smart with her." Avery winked at you. "But, you'll help out, right cutie? The pranks we could do with a squishy man like you...ooh!" Avery looked absolutely ecstatic, and you didn't know whether to find that terrifying or endearing.

A second later, Avery glanced over to her closet, and frowned. "Ah man, totally forgot about my missing box." She looked at you sadly, like a pouting puppy dog, and explained. "One of my boxes of clothes got lost. It had some of my favorite, comfy stuff in it. Like thongs, and bras, and bikinis, and skirts, and stuff. Just the best, most cute outfits. It'll suck to replace those."

"I'm sorry to hear that." You said, and you sincerely meant it. Losing belongings was always a pain.

Avery smiled genuinely at that, perhaps the first smile that wasn't one of her giddy, energetic ones. A moment later though, and Avery began staring at you intently, her eyes focusing in on you to a degree that almost felt a bit scary. It was like she was analyzing you, and you could nearly make out the gears turning in her head.

Just then, Avery's face broke into a huge, playful grin, and she blurted out her plans for spending the day with you.

1131.content:
“OMG, Hunter! I totes thought of the absolute, best, funniest prank!” Avery gushed excitedly. The pink-haired giantess bounced enthusiastically on her bed, and you really, really wished she would put you down.

Trying to form a coherent thought despite all the shaking, you spoke up. “W-well…what kind of prank is it, Avery?”

Avery’s Cheshire grin was irresistibly cute, while still possessing a disconcertingly mischievous hint to it. “We gotta prank Quinn, little dude! You’re totes perfect for it, so I was kinda thinking of some funny stuff to do, and then it hit me!” The bubbly giantess paused for a moment, and bit her lip tentatively. Looking at you with downcast eyes, she curled her sensual lips into a pout. “You’ll help me…right, Hunter?”

Being a twenty-one-year-old man with minimal experience with giantesses outside of your immediate family, you were putty in her hands. Almost dreamily, you nodded and smiled. “S-sure thing, Avery. Anything.”

Avery’s expression burst into joy, and she giggled happily. “Aw, thanks, cutie! Love ya so much!” She exclaimed, then rushed you up towards her mouth before you could react. An attempt at crying out left you the instant Avery pressed you into her plush lips, embracing your entire body in an enveloping hug of pleasure. Rational thought left your mind as Avery’s lips caressed your body, easily overtaking your one-inch form.

It was blissful, and far too short form your perspective, as Avery pulled you away after ten seconds of kissing, ending with a resounding ‘smack’ noise. You were coated in a bit of moisture from her lips, and practically panting for breath. Noting your obvious enjoyment of her kiss, Avery snickered playfully, a faint blush in her own cheeks.

“There we go, cutie! Your reward for being such an adorable lil’ trooper!” Avery explained. “But, enough of messing around. Pranks are serious business, right? We don’t cut corners around here!” Avery wagged her finger. “This could be a little uncomfy for ya, Hunter, but totes worth it in the end. I hope!”

Without explaining herself further, Avery moved her palms together, angling you between them. Still riding the high of her kiss, you didn’t process what was about to happen until it was too late. The ditzy giantess clapped her hands together, demolishing your tiny body and slamming you flatter than paper. By rubbing her palms in circles afterwards, Avery mashed your malleable body into a circular shape.

Your mind was racing into overtime now at this drastic change in your situation, but Avery wasn’t done yet. Powerless to fight her now that you were crushed, you could only grimace and blush further as Avery smoothed you out into a perfect circle, then effortlessly tore your clothes off with a single swipe of her well-manicured fingernails. You were left stark naked in her hand, a fact that brought a grin to Avery’s face.

“Thanks for taking this for the team, Hunter.” Avery smiled playfully, flicking her eyes across your body. “OMG, you are a looker, huh? Gawd, so cute!” She winked at you, and then reigned herself back in. “Anyway…time to sneak into Quinn’s room. I’m hoping she’s still downstairs, so we can be all quiet like ninjas! Uber pretty ninjas!” She giggled with a lilt, and then crept out of her room and down the hall.

Sure enough, Quinn’s room was empty, allowing Avery to waltz in unobstructed. As she entered the room, carefully maneuvering around the mess of clothes and belongings strewn about, she made her way to a dresser by the wall. On top of the dresser, there was a black bra, pair of panties, t-shirt, and shorts lying out. Avery came to a stop in front of the bra, and the smile on her face sent shivers of fear down your spine.

“Okiedokie, Hunter! Here we are!” Avery whispered excitedly. “When we were moving in earlier, I totes saw Quinn set these clothes out all purposefully and stuff. It’s gotta be what she’s wearing tomorrow. SO! I’m gonna stick you to her bra, where you can hide out or whatever, and then when she goes to put it on tomorrow, you can leap out and spook her! Or maybe tickle her! Or, or, or…bite her, or something! Whatever you want, hee hee!”

Avery, lost in her own imagined enjoyment of your future shenanigans, didn’t feel your frantic, panicked wiggles and squirms of terror. She merely moved her hand over the inside of the left cup of Quinn’s bra, and then dropped you inside. Your body sank into the cup, sliding down to the very bottom of the curve, and coming to rest. The sides of the cup arched up all around you, creating a funnel of vision that just barely revealed Avery’s radiant face out of the top. You were remained of just how utterly massive Quinn’s chest was, which brought equal feelings of anxiety and anticipation.

Your partner-in-crime, however, frowned. “Ugh, wait. Your tone totally clashes with the bra. She’ll she you right away. Plus, you look like you’d slide around easily, not stick.” Avery sighed, demonstrating surprising thoughtfulness. Unfortunately, that thoughtfulness continued, albeit down a dangerous path. “Gimme a sec, Hunter. Be back in a jiffy!”

Avery skipped away, leaving you all alone in Quinn’s bra. Wanting no part in a prank this ill-conceived and intimate, you tried to reform. Alas, you made no progress by the time Avery returned. Helpless, you couldn’t do a thing as she fished you out of the bra cup and laid you out on the dresser beside Quinn’s delicates. In her hand was a small bottle of some sort of polish liquid, and in her other, a brush.

“Looks like you need a touch-up, mister!” Avery giggled, trying and failing to sound serious. With an adorable look of concentration on her face (complete with tongue sticking out), Avery dipped the brush into the bottle, and then proceeded to paint all over your tiny body, vigorously and thoroughly. The polish was chillingly cold, freezing your skin, but you couldn’t do much to stop Avery now. Any opportunity of convincing her to stop this ridiculous prank was long gone.

In minutes, your entire body, crushed into a small circle as it was, was perfectly and uniformly colored black. Avery hadn’t missed a spot, and had even found polish with the same exact black consistency as Quinn’s bra. Side-by-side, you realized that you matched it entirely, and that realization genuinely made your blood run cold. Did Avery even realize the position she was about to put you in? Probably not, knowing her.

Avery picked you up, smiling happily at her good job, then replaced you into the bra cup. This time, she applied extra pressure herself, rubbing you down in place. Her fingers massaged your body into the fabric of the bra cup, until you felt yourself firmly sticking in place. Actually, it felt more like the sticky polish that had painted you black was adhering to the fabric of the bra.

Thankfully (or perhaps not), Avery elaborated after she finished molding you into place. “So, this handy dandy polish stuff is totes super-sticky. Glues itself to pretty much anything. Now, you should be in no danger of slipping out or coming undone.” Avery twirled a strand of her hair. “Actually, it could take some extreme measures to even get you out as well. Isn’t that amazing? There’s no way our prank can fail now!”

Your world shattered at that last remark, as it fully dawned on you that Avery had just painted you to blend into a black bra perfectly, then essentially perma-glued you in place. With the polish already hardening, it sank in that you truly were now incapable of movement. On top of that, the polish coating sealed over your face, keeping you entirely flat and thus incapable of speech. How could you even prank Quinn, at this point? The only visible part of you was your miniscule, beady eyes.

Airheaded Avery was oblivious to this though, and all she did was blow you a kiss, sauntered out of the room, and turn of the lights, leaving you well and truly alone. For the first hour you tried to reform just out of desperation, but it was hopeless. Avery had done far too good a job painting you and ironing you into place. You were locked into this now, whether you wanted to or not. In fact, it’d take help from Avery, or perhaps Quinn, to even get you loose now!

Hours passed with nothing but silence to keep you company. Meanwhile, Avery spent the rest of the day chatting and hanging out with Morgan and Quinn. Looking around at the overwhelmingly messy room, part of you wanted to offer to help her clean it up a bit. But quickly you shook that idea off. First off, lugging just one of her socks to the empty clothes hamper in the corner of the room would take you no less than 15 minutes. If you could even do it successfully in the first place. And second, you didn’t want to seem too judgmental of your new roommate’s messy habits so quickly. After all, the clothes being strewn about hadn’t been an issue for you… at least thus far.

Regardless, with every mysterious word that left Quinn’s mouth you felt yourself becoming more and more intrigued by her. Having your first few hours with the girl be spent with her knowingly compressing you into the second dimension underneath her ass caused you great fear initially. But your interactions with her since then have made it seem like even that action wasn’t out of spite, malice, or even apathy towards you like you thought. It was almost like Quinn believed in your ability to handle yourself even more than you believed in it yourself! This combined with what she said about her old friend Caleb made you desperately want to get to know this girl on a deeper level.

“So, it’s good to hear you have some experience dealing with tiny guys, Quinn. Not gonna lie, my heart nearly stopped when I first figured out that I had chosen to live with three regular sized girls earlier, but from the looks of it none of you seem like the type to do anything too harsh to me!” You nervously said up to Quinn. Part of you kicked yourself for being so forthright about your fears so quickly, but Quinn’s light chuckle and smirk reassured you that it wasn’t too much information too quickly.

“Heh, see Hunter, you’re partly right there,” she responded before leaning down, showing you a generous amount of cleavage without even realizing it, “but I wouldn’t get too cocky.” You raised an eyebrow suspiciously as she continued, “I’m not going to be looking to do anything to you… but at the same time I’m not going to be looking to not do anything to you either. Whether I notice you or not, if you find yourself between my foot and somewhere it’s stepping, my butt and somewhere it’s sitting, or anything else like that, you gotta be able to take care of yourself, got it!?”

By the end of her speech, Quinn was looking directly into your eyes as you returned the gesture. Her tone indicated the usual deadpan sarcasm with which she typically spoke, but despite this you could clearly tell that she meant every one of her words from the bottom of her heart.

Wanting to lighten the mood slightly without seeming like you were just avoiding the topic, you retorted, “Oh don’t worry, I’ve had more than my fair share of experiences with surviving situations like that! I’d like to think I’m pretty tough by now.” You bluffed slightly. While the mere fact that you were alive and free to live a somewhat normal life at that exact moment meant that you hadn’t had it as rough as some other tiny guys, you still knew deep down that your wellbeing was quite often out of your hands.

“Growing up it was just me, my mom Helen, and my younger sister Tracy for as long as I can remember.” You began to think back, Quinn relaxing a bit in her seat after her earlier words to you. You could tell from the get go that she at least cared enough about you to listen to you talk, a fact that you made sure to never take for granted when dealing with giant girls. “My mom was, and still is, in fact, one of the hardest working people I’ve ever known. She took good care of us without a doubt, but she was practically always working. The number one rule we had to follow was to never interfere with her work. Any time that either my sister or I would, she wasn’t afraid to get strict with us… to say the least. Beyond that, I lost track of how many times that she had to go away on business trips, leaving just Tracy and I to fend for ourselves sometimes, and other times calling on our Aunt Norah to house-sit for some of her longer trips.”

Quinn looked intrigued, “Well at least you always had your sister to look after one another. You two probably became super close huh? And that stinks that your mom was away so often though… I would have killed for some space from my mom growing up.” Quinn muttered the last half of her response to herself, just barely loud enough for you to hear. You wanted to ask her more about that, but once more you stopped yourself. You figured that she would tell you whenever she felt comfortable enough, and for that reason you decided not to pry further.

“Well, kind of. Tracy and I are good friends now, but throughout middle and high school it’s safe to say she went through a bit of an angsty streak.” You responded, looking down for a moment. Quinn was careful not to express too much emotion like usual, but you could still tell that she truly cared about what you were saying, so you continued. “Yeah, for some reason she felt like I was mom’s favorite or something, and was always looking to get me back for that for some reason. As much as I tried to convince her otherwise, she wouldn’t buy it. I frequently found myself at the mercy of her pretty mean-spirited pranks, or worse yet when she would try to set me up to get in trouble with our mom… but either way I always made it out in one piece!”

Quinn smirked slightly, she knew you were downplaying the severity of what you were telling her without a doubt, but at the same time it seemed like she somewhat respected your attempt to seem tough. She then perked up her head, “What about your Aunt then, Norah was her name? Surely she had to have provided a bit of a buffer between you and your sister during those years when she would look after you.”

You smiled back, “Once again, kind of,” you said with a chuckle. “When Tracy would mess with me around my mom, she had to be a little bit more tactical and sly about it, since she too would get in trouble if she was caught doing it. Whenever Norah would look after us, she never felt right punishing either one of us harshly, since we weren’t her kids after all. That meant that almost no matter what Tracy did to me, Norah would let her off no more than a slap on the wrists. On top of that, Norah was a pretty colossal airhead at times, she would frequently forget about me entirely, leave my fate in the hands of my sister, or simply not realize how much damage that she could do to me with her body. Plus, there was the added threat of Norah’s job. She was actually a tiny-specific job recruiter. I think she may even still be now. But either way, she was in charge of seeking out job-hunting guys like myself for positions in all kinds of fields of work. In all honesty I respected her for trying to help us dudes out like that… I just wished that she would have looked more carefully into some of the jobs that she was hired to do the recruiting for. There were a couple of times where she begged me to fill an emergency job listing when she couldn’t find anyone else, and I don’t think that she knew just what she was sending me into…”

Quinn’s eyebrows raised at the information that you gave her. From the sound of it, none of the three women who you interacted with most growing up were the type to coddle you or wait on your every need. This made her partly respect you for surviving such an upbringing, but deep down she did empathize with the hardships that you must have faced.

Part of you felt like again this was a lot to dump on someone you just met, but at the same time you felt an instant connection with Quinn. Deep down you wanted to know more about her, and you figured that if you shared enough of your past with her, then perhaps she would do the same.

“So, Quinn, what out of all that do ya wanna hear about?” You said confidently up to her. Some of these memories were a bit traumatic for sure, but at this point you felt comfortable enough to share them.

You nodded happily. “Sure, I can talk about them. Most of the crazy stories from my life are about the two of them anyway, so I’ve got a nearly limitless supply of tales.” You said this last bit in an over-the-top old narrator voice, causing Quinn to roll her eyes and smirk.

“You dork.” The black-haired giantess said.

Taking a moment to clear your throat, you began. “Well, as I’ve mentioned, hardly a day went by from the time Tracy was in sixth grade up to senior year where she wouldn’t bully me in some way. It was light teasing one day, and then down-right torment the next. I’ve forgiven her by now, of course…pretty hard not to with Tracy’s ceaseless apologies…but she was directly responsible for a lot of bad memories in the day.”

Quinn raised a finger inquisitively. “Hold up. I’m actually curious what brought about her change. Why did she begin treating you differently?”

You quirked your mouth to the side. “Well, I actually didn’t learn that myself for a few years, until Tracy told me herself. Since I’m a year older than her, I graduated and headed off to college when her senior year began. Tracy told me that, without me around, she quickly began to miss me. Then, seeing my mother constantly on edge with worry over my safety while I was at college by myself, Tracy realized how much she missed me for ME, not just to bully me.

“I think some introspection on Tracy’s part made her realize how dumb her perceived mistreatment was. Her persecution complex kinda fell apart as she matured, and this was the final nail in the coffin. I mean, I’m her brother, and somewhere deep inside of her she always loved me as family should. I wish she’d had the realization earlier in her life, as it would’ve saved me a lot of trouble, but…”

You trailed off, and Quinn picked up the slack. “Yeah, Hunter, that sucks. At least it worked out in the end between you and her.”

“It did. She’s pretty much my best friend now.” You nodded. “But as for past events…uh…I’ll start off with a simple one. When I was in tenth grade, I won an award for math score achievements, but Tracy lost out to one of her classmates to win her own award. As such, her persecution complex convinced her that I was to blame for her missing out on an award, and that meant she felt compelled to bully me.

“She took an interesting approach though. Grabbing me up when my mom wasn’t looking, Tracy smushed me up into a blob, and then dripped some lemon juice from our kitchen onto me. Popping me into her mouth before heading out to catch the bus, Tracy proceeded to use me as her gum for the entire day. It was a blur of crushing, smashing, and gnashing for hours on end.

“Unfortunately, it didn’t take Tracy long to realize the cruel genius of her plan. Because tiny guys like me are much more absorbent when squished, my body totally soaked in the lemon juice, thus retaining its taste and flavor through the whole day. And…uh…the next day. And the next. Tracy used me as her gum for five straight days, smiling the whole time at how tasty I was to her. It only ended when she slipped up by mentioning me on the phone with her friend when my mom was in earshot.”

Sensing your story was finished, Quinn winced. “Gum? That’s awful, Hunter. How could Tracy treat you like that, her own brother?”

You forced a laugh. “Well, it was hardly the worst thing she ever did to me. Not even close.” Quinn’s eyes narrowed tensely, and you backtracked. “I-I mean, she didn’t get off scot-free. My mom forced her to scrub the bathroom with a toothbrush every night for a week, which caused her to have to cancel a party she was planning on going to.” You paused, and frowned. “Of course, my mom also punished me for missing class, even though it was Tracy’s fault. And, Tracy saw her own punishment as my fault, so she had it out for me the next few weeks too.”

“That’s nuts.” Quinn shook her head.

“You’ve got that right.” You stated. “The cycle of bullying and punishment was and endless dance between Tracy, my mom, and I.” You rubbed your chin. “But, I don’t want you to think we were an awful family either, Quinn. For all the bad memories, there were plenty of times where my family and I all got along great. I’ve got a bunch of treasured memories somewhere in my ol’ noggin!”

Quinn smirked again. “What, like vacations and trips? Stuff like that?”

Your demeanor faded just a bit. “Uh, not always. I meant hanging out at home, or things like that. Not to say our family vacations and trips weren’t great, but…let’s just say the risk of danger to someone like me was increased by about a thousand during those times.”

Quinn’s eyed widened. “Oh, shit, really? I guess that makes sense.”

You glanced over at Quinn’s clock on the wall, seeing that there was still plenty of time left in the day. “Well, I’ll stop beating around the bush. Guess I can tell you a more specific, longer story.”

She’d informed your younger sister that she was in charge of keeping you safe.

Tracy didn’t take that too well.

“But MOM!” Tracy whined, stomping her foot once for emphasis. “I was gonna hang out with Lindsey all weekend! We’ve had these plans for over a month!”

Your mom shrugged. “I’m sorry, sweetie, but this is how it is with my job. As a consultant, I always have to be on call at any moment. I’ll make it up to you when I get back.”

Your sister sneered. “But why can’t Hunter just hang out by himself all weekend? He’s practically an adult.”

Helen patted her daughter on the shoulder. “And he’s also an inch tall. All it would take is one tiny accident without your supervision, and we could lose him. You need to stay home and look after him. Don’t baby him, but check in on him at least a few times a day.” She paused. “Speaking of, he’s still asleep, isn’t he?”

Without faltering a beat, Tracy nodded. “Yeah, I think. Haven’t seen him all day.”

Your mother sighed. “Oh well. Tell him I say goodbye. I’m going to run to the bathroom once more, and then I’m off.” She turned from Tracy and gestured to her already packed suitcase. “Could you make sure each pocket is zipped up nice and tight?”
Tracy groaned, but nodded. “Sure, mom.”

Helen wandered off to the bedroom, and Tracy waited until she heard the door shut before swearing under her breath. Angrily, she tore off the hairtie she’d been wearing, which of course was actually your squished, molded body. Glaring at your flattened form, your giantess sister frowned…until her expression morphed into one of inspiration, her eyes darting back and forth between you and Helen’s suitcase.

Finally, Tracy grinned, and leaned over you. “Ya know what, Hunter? I’m not putting my plans on hold just to look after you all weekend. Why don’t you take a nice little trip instead?” Tracy smirked, and mimed blowing you a kiss before angling her palm and letting your papery body roll off her hand and into the main pouch of the suitcase. You couldn’t do a thing to slow your descent, and merely glimpsed a final sight of your sister’s mean-spirited grin before everything became darkness as she zipped up the suitcase.

You reformed fairly quickly, but not enough to do anything about the fate Tracy had bestowed upon you. As your mother returned from the bathroom and grabbed her suitcase to begin rolling it, you toppled over, falling deeper into the piles of clothes all around you. Slipping deeper into the suitcase, your attempts at crying out to get her attention were useless, as your voice was nowhere near loud enough to penetrate outside the mound of clothes and the walls of the suitcase.

Hugging Tracy goodbye, Helen strolled out to her car, tossing the suitcase into the backseat before driving off. The simple act of tossing her suitcase into the car caused all her clothes inside to bounce around wildly, and your miniscule body was tossed around like a toy, banging into the sides of the suitcase and ending up buried under even more clothes. Your body was squished slightly, but at least the soft fabrics surrounded you comforted your experience somewhat.

This was not to say that you felt mentally comfortable at all. Because of Tracy’s grudge against you, and her general selfishness, you were now ripped from your relaxing home and helplessly being taken along on your mother’s business trip. You had no idea where Helen was heading, how long it would take for her to get there, or if she’d even find you once there. On top of that, you were already fearing whatever punishment Helen would dole out, as you knew from experiencing that her “strict but fair” nature would take no mercy on you.

For the moment, though, there was nothing you could do but wait. Straining your ears to hear, you could just barely make out the sounds of a typical airport, and from the shaking of your suitcase prison, you knew your mom had just checked in her baggage. Everything around you fell sideways, crushing you more in the shift of the clothes pile, and you guessed you were now on the luggage conveyor belt rumbling along to the plane.

The next few hours were a blur of noises, motion, and unsettling silence. Your suitcase was eventually loaded onto the plane, tossed inside and stacked. It took over an hour for the plane to board and take off, and then the actual plane flight was a few hours at least. You didn’t know for sure, because you eventually drifted off to sleep (having given up on trying to reform with the weight of the clothes crushing you down), and you regained consciousness right around the time your mom made it to her hotel.

You began mentally bracing yourself as Helen rolled the suitcase towards the elevator and up to her room. You needed to prepare to reform and get her attention, lest your situation spiral into even further chaos than it was already shaping up to be. You took a deep breath, and finally felt the entire suitcase shake and tilt as your mom laid it out on her hotel bed, and began to unzip the central pouch.

Traces of light shone down from the room into the deepest crevices of the suitcase, where you were currently located. You could hear your mom softly mumbling to herself as she systematically removed one item from her suitcase after another, no doubt taking mental inventory. Craning your head back, you could see some of the clothing around you, which consisted of multiple business blouses and skirts, an alluring formal dress, and a surprisingly revealing one-piece bikini. You tried to ignore the frilly panties and bras you could feel touching you from all sides.

At long last, your mom retrieved the pair of panties covering you up, revealing you to the world and momentarily blinding you from the light. Having managed to reform, you blinked rapidly to clear your sight, and soon found yourself staring up at your mother’s giant face. She was peering down at you quizzically, which then morphed into surprise, and finally landed on annoyance.

“…what are you doing in here, Hunter?” Helen asked, flatly.

You winced. “U-uh…just hanging out, mom. It was…um…comfy?”

Your mom wasn’t amused by your attempt to lighten the mood, and she pinched your chest and lifted you out of her suitcase. “So…you thought my lingerie was comfortable? Is that what you’re trying to say, Hunter?”

Your face flushed. “N-no, no! I was just–”

Helen sighed. “Trying to lighten the mood, right? Let me guess…Tracy threw you in here to avoid looking after you all weekend. That sound correct?”

Your eyes widened. “Yeah, pretty much.”

Your mother dropped you onto the desk beside the room’s TV and ran her hands through her hair. “That girl is grounded for a month when I get back. I really don’t have time to look after you this weekend. I have a meeting tonight with some company managers, and then I’m spending all day tomorrow with our client. Some rich heiress wants a sponsorship with our company, and I have to liaison with her.”

You blinked dumbly, having only caught some of what your mom had just said. Reading your blank expression, Helen groaned. “Oh, Hunter…I’m saying that I’m too busy to keep a close eye on you. It just can’t happen…” She paused, and sat back on her bed. “Well, I suppose that I could…hmm.”

“If I can do anything to help, I will!” You offered enthusiastically, earning an eye roll from your mother.

“You just want out of punishment, don’t you?” Helen inferred. “Still, I guess I DO have a few options as for what to do with you. Hmm.” Your mom rubbed her chin while staring intently at you, and you felt a small shiver go down your spine. Something about the look in her eyes, while kind and caring and loving, had the same hint of danger you sensed from Tracy frequently.

You had the sinking feeling you weren’t getting out of your mom’s business trip unscathed.

11421321.content:
From your slightly folded up position in your mother’s bag, you could only listen to the carefree attitude of this woman that Helen referred to as an heiress earlier that day. From the sound of the conversation, she must have ordered a few tropical drinks for herself and your mother, clearly not intent on taking a break from her lavish lifestyle for even a second. It sounded quite nice to be honest. Enjoying a relaxing day in the sun, drinking drinks, just enjoying a day as a normal person was tragically something that didn’t come often to tiny guys like you. Instead, all thanks to the vendetta your sister held against you, you had to spend the entire previous day wedged between your own mom’s ass cheeks, getting battered and sweat-soaked as more time went on. Even the break you were receiving now wasn’t really a break, you were still immobilized and trapped in the dark of Helen’s purse. Your only solace was knowing that your mom was a fair woman at the end of the day, and Tracy would get her punishment as well when the two of you returned from this trip. Of course, Tracy’s punishment would end up being something infuriatingly normal, such as getting grounded, but at least it was something. Suddenly you were awoken from your daydream as the slightly nasally and haughty voice of the presumed heiress rung out once more.

“Hey Helen, you got any gum in here? That drink had kind of a funky aftertaste.” Danielle said before opening up your mom’s purse without even waiting for a response. She really was a spoiled brat after all. Immediately light flooded into your eyes, blinding you briefly as you adjusted your vision from the dark. What you couldn’t see was Danielle’s eyes lighting up as she reached in with one exquisitely manicured finger and lifted you up into the air by one of the “straps” that consisted of two of your limbs tied together. “Helen! You dirty girl, what do we have here? Let me guess, an intern got a little cheeky with you so you’re letting him get some of your cheeks in return!?”

Your eyes finally adjusted to the light and you saw the radiant beauty of this woman holding you up in the air like no more than an object. Her looks seemed perfectly crafted, without a doubt a mixture of unmatched genetics as well as some likely expensive procedures. Either way, she was stunning, but the type of stunning that struck fear into your heart.

“Oh… uhh, yeah you got it, an intern. But I’m only keeping him like that for the day. It’s mostly a threat, I didn’t plan on actually wearing him. Just teaching him a bit of a lesson.” Helen responded. She went along with the heiress’s assumption, preferring that excuse over having to explain the complicated situation with her own son.

A gleam of mischief flashed through Danielle’s eyes as she clearly came up with a plan. With the hand that wasn’t currently holding you she reached down and deftly hooked one sharpened, manicured nail into her tan swimsuit bottom, tearing it along the seam! “Oh no, Helen! It seems like something has happened to my swimsuit bottom! Oh if someone catches a picture of me naked in public that would certainly be a blow to my image… or moreso a blow to any companies trying to sponsor me, wouldn’t it?”

Your mother’s expression looked panicked immediately. While you almost never saw her look this flustered, when it came to her job she refused to let a single thing go wrong if she had anything to say about it. Briefly, her eyes locked on with yours, giving you a look of sympathy, as despite her calculated dishing out of punishment, she still was your mother at the end of the day. But her desire to land this sponsorship unfortunately won out over your wellbeing.

“Well then it’s your lucky day, Danielle, slide the guy on, he deserves it anyway.”

“That’s what I like to hear.” The heiress grinned, simply tearing the rest of her clearly expensive but now ruined bikini bottom away before roughly shimmying you up her thick thighs without even standing up from the lounge chair she was on. You cried as you felt your skin rub against this overly tanned goddess’s smooth, oiled flesh. But after a moment this sensation was replaced by a much more familiar one, your torso rocketing up between a woman’s ass cheeks. With a grunt Danielle slung you up into her crack, your arms tied around her hips and your legs squished just wide enough to cover her frontside. You were comically small, just as you were on your mother mere hours ago, and your relatively pale skin stuck out as an off white on this bronzed goddess.

“See this is why I like you Helen. We don’t hate tiny guys or anything, but we understand as two strong, beautiful women that if a tiny can make our lives easier then why shouldn’t we be allowed to use them to do so?” Danielle said, while simultaneously signaling to the nearest poolside waitress that she was ready for another drink. Helen nervously looked down at the heiress’s lower body, torn between empathy for her son and concern for possibly angering such a high profile client.

You, meanwhile, couldn’t believe what your mother just did. Not only did she lie about who you were, but she knowingly allowed you to be worn by this stranger. You thought you were at least going to get a brief respite from being ass floss for a curvaceous woman, but it seemed like once again fate had other plans.
