11422.content:
“So, I’m just really curious about this Norah person.” Quinn said, finally deciding on a conversation topic. “Like, I get that she’s your aunt, but you’re being a little cagey about what it was like to actually be around her. Seems like it might’ve been a mix of good and bad, huh?”

You laughed shortly. “Yeah, you kind of hit the nail on the head, Quinn. Aunt Norah was really a handful. It’s been about a year now since I’ve last seen her. The last time was when she came over for a surprise visit during Christmas time, and stayed a week. I spent Christmas day sloshing away in her stomach after she swallowed me with her eggnog, and that was hardly the only incident that week.”

“Oh, yikes.” Quinn’s eyes widened. “You did mention she was pretty airheaded, didn’t you?”

“I was putting it lightly, for her sake.” You groaned. “Norah’s a total scatterbrain. I’ll be sitting on the couch, she’ll see me and say hello, turn around and notice her favorite show is on, and then sit down to watch it for three hours…right on top of me! Even then, I’m lucky if she realizes what she’s done when she finally does stand up, or if I’m glued to her butt for the foreseeable future.” You gave Quinn a sidelong look. “And of course, if we’re talking six or more years ago, Tracy would’ve let it all happen with a quiet smirk.”

Quinn tapped her chin thoughtfully. “Norah and your sister put you through the ringer, huh? Gotta say, it’s impressive you survived through it all.”

You nodded. “Guess you could say I learned from every experience. Certainly there are some experiences that I wish I could burn from my brain, though.” You forced out a laugh. “In my worst nightmares, I can still remember Norah believing Tracy back in middle school, when she squished up my body and said I was a ‘new, special toe cleaner’. Norah used me to pick out lint and toe jam from her disgusting feet for a week…before throwing me in the trash where I barely escaped before being taken out to the curb.”

Quinn gaped, but said nothing for a moment. Finally, she frowned. “And can you tell me more about that…tiny recruiter…thing? Her job, right?”

“Yeah, and it was a cushy one that let her mostly work from home.” You explained. “Basically, Norah was assigned a sheet of tiny-specific job postings, and then needed to recruit tinies to fill the spots as quickly as possible. It wasn’t too hard for her. Tiny-exclusive jobs pay really well, usually because of the danger involved, and Norah’s exuberance was hard to turn down. She’s also…and I mean this from a purely factual standpoint, not anything weird…really attractive given her age. Most tinies would fall head over heels to make her happy by saying yes.

“The trouble was, given her penchant for being forgetful and oblivious, Norah would almost never explain the jobs clearly or fully. She probably just didn’t get how awful some tasks could be when you’re just one inch. She’d also overestimate herself sometimes, and come up short with approaching deadlines. That’s where she’d come and rope me into a job, promising double pay and that they would only be for a week or so.” You paused. “However, one week of serving as a head executive’s ‘stress toy’ felt like an eternity when I did it.”

This last statement drew ire from Quinn, and a flash of anger danced in her eyes. “One of her recruiting jobs was to sell yourself as a stress toy?” The black-haired giantess asked moodily.

“Yep. And there were plenty that were so much worse. Again, Norah was kind of too dumb to realize what she was coercing so many tinies into, so I can’t be too mad at her specifically. Those are still some bad memories of mine.” You stopped for a second and then smiled wistfully. “That sums up Norah, actually. A decent bit of good wrapped up in a whole lot of bad. Add in Tracy during her torment years, and you’ve hit peak awful.” You chuckled.

Quinn shook her head, overwhelmed by the sheer craziness of your life. Even still, you could see the intrigue dancing in her eyes now that her anger had cooled, and sure enough, a minute later, she was ready to hear some more specific stories.
11422.title: The Sister and the Aunt

choices: Continue
114221.content:
Wanting to keep up this pace, you jumped right into your next offer. “I’ve got a story about Tracy and Norah, if you’re interested.” You explained. “It just came to me.”

Quinn leaned back in her chair and folded her arms in front of her prodigious chest. “Sure, go ahead.”

“Alright.” You rubbed your hands together. “It’s nothing too crazy. Basically…”

(FLASHBACK BEGIN)

It was the summer between tenth and eleventh grade, in the middle of blistering August. By this point of the summer, you’d finished all of your preparatory assigned work for the upcoming school year, so you were totally free for the remaining ten days of your break. As such, you spent most of your time sprawled out on the couch lazily watching TV. It was easy living, perhaps a bit boring, but definitely relaxing.

On this particular day, you’d made sure to avoid the havoc hurricane that was Aunt Norah. She’d arrived the day prior, showing up minutes before your mom headed out on another of her seemingly endless business trips. Norah hadn’t been in the house for more than five minutes before she’d plopped her gargantuan buttocks onto your tiny body, not noticing you on the chair she’d claimed as her own. Of course, Tracy had let her sit there for over an hour before letting slip your whereabouts.

Norah had given her trademark quick apology, laughing as she did so, and though you knew she meant well, you knew it was safer for you to just distance yourself from her as much as possible. This morning she was sequestered away in a side room, probably in the middle of one of her daily yoga sessions. She hadn’t crushed or smushed you yet, and you were determined to keep it that way by maintaining a healthy distance from your airheaded aunt, all day if need be.

A few minutes later, your younger sister walking by, sparing a quick sidelong glance at you before she approached the room Norah was in. Opening the door, Tracy was hit by an overwhelming wave of heat, and she gasped for breath. Even from across the room on the couch, you could feel the hot temperatures of the room hit your face, and could hardly imagine what Norah was doing in there.

Thankfully, Tracy spoke for you, poking her head into the room. “Aunt Norah, what are you doing? Why is it so freakin’ hot in here?” Tracy laughed. “You’re sweating up a storm!”

Norah’s hearty laugh floated all the way from the room to your ears. “Oh, good morning, Tracy, dear! I wanted to switch up my morning yoga by trying out something I saw online. It’s called hot yoga, I think. The point is to work up a crazy sweat.”
Tracy wrinkled up her nose. “Really? That seems kinda gross.”

Norah laughed again; her voice tinged with a hint of exhaustion. “It is, but it truly does feel good to get it all out, you know? It’s why I closed all the windows in this room, turned off the AC, and brought in that heater in the corner. The hotter the better…or so I read.”

“I mean, you do you, Aunt Norah.” Tracy giggled, moving to step back and close the door.

“Oh wait!” Norah called out. “If you could do one quick thing for me, dear? I forgot a sweat rag, and I sure as heck will need one by the time I’m down. Preferably sooner. Could you get one for me?”

Tracy nodded, not at all surprised her scatterbrained aunt would forget something so crucial for morning exercise. “Sure thing, I’ll be right back.”

“You’re an angel, Tracy!” Were Norah’s last words before Tracy closed the door and walked back towards you, moving to pass through the living room and towards the bathroom to procure a washcloth.

On her way, she glanced over at you again, and stopped in her tracks. Your younger sister paused while staring at you, frowning. An expression danced in her eyes, one of curiosity and inquisitiveness, a look which you failed to notice as you’d gone back to happily watching TV. You didn’t so much as glance the huge grin which began to grow on Tracy’s face, nor the malicious glint in her eyes as she sauntered over to you.

It was only when Tracy was directly beside you, towering above you that you noticed her. Taking your eyes off the TV, you craned your neck all the way back to peer up at your giantess sister, her smirk on full display. Feeling incredibly uneasy, you tried to play it cool and hopefully diffuse any situation that may be brewing. You had no idea what her plans were.

“Uh…hey, Tracy.” You said, as casually as possible, though your voice still wavered. Tracy grinned wider, seemingly pleased that you were so on-edge around her.

“What’s up, Hunter? Finished all your schoolwork for the first day of class in a week and a half?” Tracy asked, almost friendly, though her unsettling grin remained.

You gulped. “Y-yeah…”

“Great! Doing anything today?” Tracy put her hands on her hips and leaned just a little closer to you. You subconsciously drew into yourself a bit.

“…no?”

“Is that right?” Your aunt chuckled. “I’ll put it to the test, then!”

Tracy grinned, half genuinely and half maliciously. Her plan would’ve been ruined if Norah had called her out on the lie, as excellent as it was. Thankfully for Tracy, her plan was flawless. “I’ll leave you to it!” Your cruel sister giggled, then excused herself, closing the door behind her.

Without another thought, Norah dropped you onto the floor on top of her previously discarded compression shorts. A minute later you felt a sense of weightlessness as Norah hefted you and her gross clothes off the ground, and she sauntered out of the room.

The grave look on his face honestly scared you as he continued, “My new assistant, Grace, is without exaggeration, the most oblivious airhead I have ever dealt with in my entire life. And I know what you’re thinking already, but I can’t fire her because she’s the daughter of one of my lifelong friends… I used to love this job, but she makes it a living hell. I can’t get through a single workday in one piece. I just need a break from it all.”

The guy ended his monologue and you didn’t know what to say. He had an assistant after all, could her being a little forgetful or dumb really be that bad? Once again you were about to ask him more about both the job and now this wildcard girl but just then the door swung open! And through those doors walked what could only be described as an angel come to life.

The woman was strikingly tall, first of all, likely standing around 5’10” if not taller. She had feathered long blonde hair that was parted down the center, cascading and framing her face perfectly. On that face was a pair of oversized, thick rimmed glasses that almost looked fake, like a nerd costume put on by the most popular girl in a cheesy movie. Her face was slender, with a radiant white smile shining through. Your eyes then practically popped open as your sight was drawn to her body. She was wearing a tight white button down shirt, with said buttons holding on for dear life behind the tremendous breasts that threatened their integrity. The shirt was tucked into a decidedly not-safe-for-work length black pencil skirt that showed off nearly all of her long, tanned legs. Not to mention an oversized yet firm ass that you could quite literally see from the front. Finally, a pair of open toed black heels added an extra three inches of unnecessary height to the woman.

You were flabbergasted. While a few women in your life had her assets beat in terms of sheer size, such as Norah, your mother Helen, and now your new roommate Quinn. This woman’s ratio of breasts and butt to waist was on another level. For all intents and purposes, she looked like a porn star more than an office assistant.

“Hi Mister Sebastian!” She chirped giddily as she walked into the room, and you realized up until that moment that you hadn’t even received his name either. You waited a brief second for either her to greet you or Sebastian to introduce you, but before either of those things could happen you saw the large coffee cup that Grace was holding head straight for your position before slamming on top of your body, squishing you flat onto the desk as well as burning you beneath warm cardboard.

“Grace! Didn’t I tell you to get me a tiny size cup from downstairs? Also pick up that cup right now my replacement is under it!” Grace’s eyes widened with surprise as she took a moment to process even this simplest of requests, before finally lifting the coffee cup to reveal your now reddened, slightly twitching form.

“Ohmygosh I’m so sorry! Please forgive me I didn’t mean to!” The goddess of a woman bent down and scooped you up briefly, blowing air over your body in an attempt to cool you like some sort of fresh pastry or something. To be honest you quickly forgot about the airhead’s blunder, as the sight of her gorgeous face trying to help you overwhelmed your senses.

“Grace, his name is Hunter, treat him with the same respect that you treat me with until I get back. Got it?” Grace simply turned and looked between you two before smiling for a moment. “Also I have to get out of here rather quickly so if you don’t mind getting me on that elevator I can be on my way.”

Grace looked back at the elevator she came up in, the doors just starting to close from when she stepped off less than a minute ago. “Oh, okay I got it!” She said in an instant, dropping you about a foot carelessly onto the desk before scooping up your predecessor in her hands. In a move that both shocked and amazed you, Grace reached her hand back and hurled Sebastian as hard as she could down the hall and into the elevator doors just before they closed! You could only watch as he flattened immediately against the back wall before fluttering down to the ground like a piece of paper. You prayed that nobody else in the building would be getting on that elevator before he reached the ground floor.

“Nailed it!” She said happily as she turned back to you and enchanted you with her smile again.

How does your “normal” job go with this ditz of an assistant?

1142211112.content:
“Alright well, did you ever attempt to get Tracy back for these pranks?” Quinn asked with interest. “I sure hope you didn’t just take it all without fighting back.” The black-haired giantess paused for a moment. “Let me rephrase that. Makes me sound like I love violence. I just mean…did you ever try to give her a taste of her own medicine?”

You nodded without hesitation. “Oh sure, tons of times.” Quinn’s eyebrows raised at that, and you hastily backtracked. “I-I mean, I was young, and she was young. Of course we weren’t mature enough to hold back. So yeah, I managed to prank her on several occasions.”

“Really? Can you tell me about it?”

You winced. “Sure…but the stories really aren’t much different from what I’ve already talked about. See, even if I could get the drop on Tracy, figuratively speaking, it would never last long. Tracy was a cruel genius when it came to tormenting me, and it’d take her seconds at most to turn my prank right back around against me.”

Quinn huffed a laugh. “Sounds rough dude…BUT…I am still interested, if you’re willing.”

You shrugged. “Why not? This is fun, to let all this out. Here’s a story I just remembered…”

(FLASHBACK BEGIN)

You were in seventh grade, and Tracy was in sixth grade (making you 12 and Tracy 11). The two of you attended Templeton Secondary School, which was a massive and sprawling school complex that comprised both middle and high schools into one giant building. This meant that students from sixth grade to twelfth grade all stayed under one roof.

Tracy had made a promise to you the night before. Right as you were going to head to sleep, Tracy snuck into your room and explained that the chairs in her first period class had recently been replaced by uncomfortable plastic seats. Tracy promised she’d steal you and use you as a squishy seat covering all day so that she’d be more comfy.

Because of that, a very Tracy-like idea popped into your mind, and you set to work. Sneaking into your mother’s room, you managed to steal a tiny little sewing needle, only about half an inch long. You then hid the needle in your backpack, and went back to bed. Tracy was insistent on using you as a cushy seat, you’d give her a stabby little surprise in return.

In the morning, Tracy put on a good show of taking you carefully to school in front of your mom. She even refrained from squishing you all the way through the bus ride to Templeton, and carried you dutifully to the hallway juncture where she would normally set you down. However, owing to her promise, Tracy instead clenched her fist around you and skipped off to her first-period.

Once in the classroom, Tracy said good morning to her homeroom teacher, Miss Carlisle. Miss Carlisle, a peppy thirty-year old woman, was known throughout Templeton for her compassion, tough-but-fair discipline, and alluring good looks. Though she dressed in modest skirts and blouses, Miss Carlisle’s pronounced curves were still accentuated, and it was clear that she was oblivious to how many stares she drew from male and female students alike.

Class was about to begin, so Tracy scurried over to her seat as Miss Carlisle rose from her desk to close the door. Making sure no one was looking, Tracy sneered at you and then dropped you from where she held you onto her chair. The height of the fall squished you a fair bit, and you fumbled to pull the needle from your backpack.

You yanked the needle from your backpack and thrust it up into the air, grinning as you saw Tracy had already turned her back to you. As her petite frame descended down onto you, you were filled with a sense of victory that you hadn’t felt in a long time. Even as Tracy’s butt made contact and crushed you flat, you were still happy.

Instantaneously, Tracy let out a yelp and bolted upright, launching out of her seat. As she did so, she banged her knee onto her desk, spilling her papers onto the floor. On top of that, Miss Carlisle had been in the middle of speaking, and her speech was interrupted by Tracy’s outburst. All eyes in the room turned on her, and her face flushed as red as a ripe tomato.

Miss Carlisle quirked her mouth. “Tracy? Some reason for crying out, dear?”

Your sister hunched her shoulders inward, the perfect picture of ashamed embarrassment. “I-I sat on something…I think.” She replied, her voice small and wavering.

Clearly sympathetic, Miss Carlisle offered her a gentle smile. “It’s fine, sweetheart. Just don’t interrupt again, okay?”

“Y-yes Miss Carlisle.” Tracy stammered, and a few students around her chuckled. Wishing she could curl up and cry, Tracy finally looked down to see what she’d ended up sitting on, and spotted a tan glob and a miniscule needle. Though initially confused, she finally recognized what she was looking at.

You’d never forget the expression she made at that moment, a look of such primal fury and promise of revenge that your cocky victory drained up into paralyzing fear in an instant. Your blood ran even colder as Tracy’s mouth curled into a sadistic smile, and you could see the gears of cruelty turning in her head. It was obvious you’d screwed up in trying to one-up her at her own game.

Still too crushed to move, you were helpless as Tracy scooped you and the needle up into her hand. Without any other student seeing what she’d done, Tracy slipped you into her tight jean pocket, keeping you flat and secure. She then settled into her seat, willed her embarrassment to go away, and allowed the rest of the class to pass like normal.

She sprung her revenge on you when the period ended. After this many weeks of school, Tracy had Miss Carlisle’s daily routine memorized. After first period, Miss Carlisle always went to the bathroom before returning to teach second period. On top of that, Tracy had her as a teacher for two periods in a row. This allowed her the perfect opportunity.

Miss Carlisle and the other students left the room, and when the coast was clear, Tracy dashed up to her teacher’s desk and around to the plush comfy chair Miss Carlisle had to herself. Retrieving you from her pocket, she slapped you down onto the chair’s cushion, facing up, and then stuck the needle into your mangled hands, forcing you to hold it straight up. Tracy’s intent for you became clear all together, and you fought madly to wiggle and squirm free, but to no avail.

Your demonic sister merely blew you a mock kiss and then strolled away, at the same moment Miss Carlisle returned from the bathroom. Sparing a smile at Tracy, the giantess teacher was looking anywhere but down at her chair, and soon she was standing right above you. Your twelve-year-old brain was momentarily overwhelmed by peering up your curvy teacher’s skirt, but as she began to sit, you went straight back to panic.

Miss Carlisle plopped into her seat, the needle did its job, and she hopped right back up with a startled yelp. Glancing down at her chair, she frowned in confusion at the mushed blob and tiny needle.

Sensing her chance, Tracy piped up. “Oh no! Miss Carlisle! Did he get you too?” She asked with feigned concern.

The teacher frowned, looked at Tracy, then back at you. Recognition shown in her eyes. “Hunter Woods? Is that you?” She flicked the needle aside, then put her hands on her hips. “Young man! I can’t believe you!”

Your sister fought her smile down. “It was him who pricked me earlier. I didn’t say anything, because I know that he can just be a troublemaker from time to time. But now that he’s done it twice…”

“He definitely needs discipline.” Miss Carlisle nodded sagely, and Tracy filled with glee. “Now, young man, I understand kids will be kids, but pricking your teacher with a needle cannot go unpunished. One needs to learn their lesson and act more mature, whether they are tiny or not.”

Intensely curious, but trying not to be conspicuous, Tracy spoke up tentatively. “What are you going to do to him?”

Miss Carlisle winked at Tracy. “Well, he’s already on my chair. I figure staying there for a class period is punishment enough.” She braced herself. “Of course, it is still MY chair too, so…”

Without another word, Miss Carlisle sat again, and her prodigious posterior slammed onto your tiny body, decimating you. With a small wiggle, the giantess teacher got a bit more comfortable, and also smeared you beneath her shapely booty. You groaned internally as your body flattened out more and more from the pressure, the heat already rising to unbearable levels.

Hardly keeping her Cheshire grin in check, Tracy slipped back to her seat, supremely satisfied that she’d put you in your place.

(FLASHBACK END)

“Yeah, that did come right back on you, didn’t it?” Quinn said with a light chuckle. You couldn’t help but also laugh.

“I didn’t think it through, that’s for sure.” You shook your head. “It didn’t even stop there, really. Thanks to some more manipulation from Tracy, Miss Carlisle totally forgot about me stuck under her butt, and stayed sitting on me all day. And the next day. And the day after that. It was day four of being pounded under her butt that she happened to spot me by chance. She apologized profusely and promised to give me an A on the upcoming test if I didn’t tell my mom about what she’d unintentionally done.”

Quinn stretched her arms and yawned. “Yeesh. Tracy was a little menace, that’s for sure. I really hope she’s improved like you say she has.”

You nodded. “Oh, she has, seriously. She’s such a great and supportive friend now. But since we’re talking about past Tracy…”

"This reminds me of another time I tried to get back at Tracy!" You said pounding a fist into your open palm.

Quinn rolled her eyes dramatically before replying, "If that last story reminded you of something, I doubt this one has a happier ending..."

You let out a nervous laugh before scratching the back of your head, "Yeah...I guess not, but it was really good in theory!" You began tapping your chin in an attempt to recall how you came up with the brilliant plan to begin with. "Let's see...it all started with Tracy watching one of her dumb shows..."

(Flashback Start)

It was a sweltering summer afternoon just after you had finished up your 9th grade and you and Tracy had seemingly called a ceasefire in order to peacefully beat the heat inside. With school out and hardly anything else going on on this drab day, the both of you had found yourselves situated in front of the TV passing the time. Just because you weren't at each other's throats with trying to torment each other didn't mean Tracy didn't have the upper hand though. When Tracy wanted the TV, and your mom was out of town, that meant Tracy got to pick what you watched.

This afternoon was unfortunately one of those times as your mom had, as per usual, left Norah to watch after you two while she attended to business abroad. Besides being stepped on when Norah first arrived though, you'd thankfully managed to stay out of her crushing embrace. You weren't sure how long it would be until Tracy attempted to change that, but as long as she was kept even mildly entertained you figured you didn't have too much to worry about.

Sitting atop the arm rest, your job was to keep that entertainment in tact. When Tracy wanted the volume up, you were to hop right onto the remote and turn it up. If she wanted the channel changed, you'd better be on it, pronto. You'd tried resisting her commands in the past, but that resulted in Tracy merely lifting up the remote, and letting it leisurely fall right onto you, easily smothering your one-inch form and keeping it planted until she picked the remote up again. This was, without saying, only when she was being efficient in her taking care of you. God forbid she was feeling especially mischievous, or you may end up down on the floor between her restlessly playful feet or even worse, crushed underneath her butt where you wouldn't be able to see or hear the TV at all.

So this meant that today was another day of dutifully manning the remote while Tracy flipped, or had you flip, through channels. Nothing seemed to keep her attention long, or maybe she just loved watching you scramble across the wide remote. Finally settling on a lame sitcom she adored, and you despised, you took a moment to rest as Tracy sipped on a soda and let out a satisfied "ah".

Today's antics on the show were as cheesy as ever, with one of the side characters returning from her teaching job with a seat cushion glued to her backside. She lamented on that one of her damned students had "accidentally" left a glob of glue on her chair and she was none the wiser when she sat down. This resulted in Tracy nearly chocking on her drink as soda nearly came out of her nose. You rolled her eyes at how easily amused she was, even for her age, when a light bulb went off in your head.

The following day the stars seemed to align perfectly. Norah had just belted out that she was going to run, literally you assumed as she usually did, to the store to grab some things for the both of you, and Tracy was up in her room where she had been most of the day. This was the perfect set-up you needed to get some surprise payback on your devilish little sis.

It was quite the hassle, but you had actually managed to lug a tiny, single use, bottle of super glue up onto the family couch. The plan was so simple. Pour every last bit of the glue out onto the cushion, wait for Tracy to inevitably come down and take a seat, and then laugh as she's either glued to the whole couch, or at the very least trapped with a cushion attached to her butt!

You were already trembling with excitement, imagining the flush red look of embarrassment and rage on her face when she realizes shes been had by her little bug-brother. Without wasting another second, you hastily poured out the gray goopy fluid until it formed a dense puddle. Needing to dispose of the evidence, you pushed the empty bottle from the ledge of the couch, hoping it would roll itself under, before taking a step back to admire your handiwork when...*splish*

You looked down only to see your right foot thoroughly entrenched in the thick liquid. You grabbed at your knee in an attempt to pull your leg free but only succeeded in knocking yourself off balance as you fell backwards. Trying to do a sit-up proved futile and soon you threw your arms down in frustration...only for them to get locked in the hazy goop as well. You strained your eyes to see your whole body was covered in the dense gray glue, and you knew immediately your plan had been a catastrophic failure.

An awful and anxiety inducing thirty minutes passed with your body slowly wearing itself out as you struggled against your overwhelming powerful prison. Why did you have to use the damn super glue? Regular glue would've gotten the job done, and you probably would've never gotten into this mess. Just as your sorrow reached it peak, it transformed into fear as the ground shook as the only person it could be pranced down the stairs. You had a mix of terror and excitement as you wondered if your plan would at least work, but you got your answer when Tracy arrived at the couch and stepped on something.

"Ow! What the hell was that?" Tracy asked aloud with definite annoyance. Grabbing the bottle that she had totally flattened under her pink-socked foot, Tracy read the label slowly to herself in a whisper before looking around. You meekly let out a "Hey, Trace..." as her eyes met yours and her lips warped into a wicked smile.

"Oh. My. God. Don't tell me. Please don't tell me you really thought you could prank me or something with this glue," Tracy's mouth was hanging open in a mix of shock and joy at your hilarious failure. The pitiful pout on your face was all the answer she needed, "Oh, you DID! And you got the idea from the show yesterday didn't you! OH that is just too good!" Tracy wiped a tear from her eye as she bounced evilly above you.

"Come on, it was a dumb idea, but at least it was funny. Can't you check the label and try and get me out of here? I'm sorry..." You tried to plead but you weren't sure your words were registering at all as Tracy's face went red in a totally opposite way of what you had intended.

"Oh not a chance, Hunter. You even used a gray glue on our gray couch! You're such a dope! I can barely see your little face down there!" Tracy did want to check out the label, just to see if there was anything else she could torment you with. And as usual, luck was right on her side as her face somehow beamed even brighter. "Oh, get this. I bet you didn't even read the back where it lists the solvent. SALIVA! HAH! That is too perfect! Just right for a gross bug like you, though!"

Tracy loomed her face until it was a centimeter from your own. Each word she spoke down to you bathed you in a thick smog of her breath. "I bet you'd kill for me to just let a drop of spit slide down my tongue onto you? Wouldn't you, little Hunter?" Her lips were all consuming in your vision and you winced as their plump exterior parted to allow her tongue to hang loose over your helpless body. "Well, go ahead, beg to be set free. BEG me to drool all over your pathetic body!" Tracy was playfully hanging her tongue down over you and you hated how it truly was taunting you as a savior. Her hot breath's sultry and overpowering in their presence, forcing you to breath in her humid air as it left moisture on your face and dampened your hair.

"NEVER!" You cried out, hoping it wasn't your last word. Tracy simply closed her mouth, a bit surprised, and retreated her face from your own, returning the air to a decent temperature.

"Hmph. Fine. Suit yourself, little bro. Oh but one last thing before I leave you as a couch stain..." Tracy squeezed the bottle in her grip with fervor, allowing one minuscule drop to fly loose, right onto your poor exposed mouth. "There. Now you can't free yourself and no one has to listen to your whiney voice anymore."

Just then, the front door flew open, and in stumbled Norah, plopping her bags down on the ground and wiping fresh sweat from her brow. Tracy quickly slid the bottle, the only evidence of your location, into her pocket. "Would you mind unloading these, dear? I'm exhausted!"

"Of course, Aunt Norah!" Tracy winked at you before skipping away cutely and joining Norah in grabbing the bags. "Why don't you just go rest on the couch? I think that movie you love is starting soon!"

"Oh, really?! Thanks, honey, I appreciate it!" Norah slid off her beat-up running shoes before walking on over to the couch. The squelching sound her socked feet were making on the hardwood floor was making you wince as you worried you knew what was coming next. You fought with renewed vigor but the glue, and Tracy's fresh addition, was way too strong. You gulped as you wondered if you should have taken Tracy's offer after all.

What appeared in your vision next is what truly made your heart sink. It was none other than Norah's booty of course, a sight you recognized better than the palm of your own hand, but it was what was plastered on it that made your blood cold.

Gray spandex. Norah's gigantic, plump and juicy rear was covered in a visibly damp layer of gray leggings. You peered down and saw the still wet glue all over yourself and prayed for any kind of mercy. But all you received was the muggy and hot embrace of Norah's rear as she got comfy in the coincidental spot you happened to be.

The irony of that statement was that Norah seemed to particularly be enjoying these yoga sessions and began throwing in an extra one in the evening. She did have the free time after all since she was just looking after Tracy.

As the days droned on Norah spoke to you less and less. One session went by without even a word, and you worried Norah was beginning to forget you were even a person and not an extra special yoga rag. After a grueling SIX days under Norah she finally seemed to recall who you were and asked Tracy how long it had been with you in towel form. You did have some sort of deal after all, she was just a bit hazy with her memory.

"I'm pretty sure it's been about three days, so I'd say you have another seven before he wants some kind of reward." Tracy lied through her teeth to which Norah accepted without question. You tried to scream and protest with every fiber of your being, but Norah didn't feel a thing and merely tucked half of you into her waistband to carry. Taking you into the sweltering studio once more, Norah decided she'd really push herself to her limits while she was here.

After an excruciating two weeks of nonstop sweat, stench, crushing, and being squished into Norah, Tracy finally popped her head into the steamy studio one day and called out, struggling to restrain her coughing and hold her breath, "Hey Norah, Mom just called! She'll be back tomorrow and said you can head out whenever!" Portions of your soaked tan body were splayed out under Norah's thick ass as she responded, "Thanks, dear, I'll probably get out of here this evening then!"

It had been a week since Norah had even uttered a word to you, and whenever her eyes laid upon you, they were only filled with a gaze that conveyed her feelings of utility to you and not one of recognition. As Norah scrubbed you against each of her slick, sweaty soles at the end of that day's session, she felt a weird nagging in the back of her head that she was overlooking something. Whatever it was, she had the overwhelming sudden hunger for some ice cream as soon as possible.

That evening, after a particularly long and grueling session, Norah was packing her things away when she came upon your tan and flattened form. Gazing up at this uncaring gorgeous face, you prayed for some kind of recognition that this airhead would remember who you were!

With steadfast resolve, Norah decided your fate by...
114221131.title: Extending a Deal you Never Made

choices: You're found and reform, but Norah wants you to stay a while...
You've been squashed into some underwear, or she just doesn't recognize you
1142211311.content:
Norah held you up in front of her face. She had her head cocked slightly to the side and you saw a haze stirring in her eyes as she curiously stared at you. Why was she looking at you like this? If she was heading home it was time for you to be free from this duty as a living sweat rag. Or at the very least she could leave you in the washer, tucked in a drawer, or hell you'd even be fine with her giving you to Tracy; anything was better than having her not recognize you and somehow end up extending this torture. Thankfully she seemed to have a moment of clarity as her expression lit up and she looked at you fondly.

"Ahhhh, and how could I forget you?" Norah chuckled to herself, you weren't sure if she was laughing at how she had totally forgotten you a moment ago or if she was just laughing because her own nephew was a towel in the palm of her hand. Unfortunately Norah's next words revealed it was neither: "I don't know how I'd do yoga without it! Such an absorbent little thing...". It? A thing?! Sure it had been two whole weeks but it was Norah's job to be looking after the two of you while she was here! All she had done was put you in more trouble!

Laying you down amongst her clothes, Norah was pressing down on you and all her belongings trying to get the bag to zip shut. You heard her begin cursing under her breath as her palm smooshed you down into a pair of her underwear. "Stupid thing...everything fit in here on my way over...what gives?!" Just at that moment, Tracy walked by Norah's guest room and saw her struggling.

"Sup, Aunt Norah?" Tracy asked as innocently as ever. Wearing a frilly skirt she truly was as cute as could be, a true angel in the eyes of your aunt.

Norah wiped a droplet of sweat from her forehead, "I can't close this dang suitcase! I hardly had any trouble getting it closed at home!" Norah gave it another annoyed push before plopping down on the bed next to it.

Tracy was taping her chin curiously, then she saw your tan form squished and laying amongst a loose sock and a pile of underwear. A vibrant mischievous grin stretched across her supposedly innocent face. As you saw her approach you, you prayed that just this one time she'd show you a little mercy. Instead she did a twirl that lifted her skirt from the gust of wind and fell backwards. You saw nothing but a pair of pink and white striped panties painted on your sister's butt before it splatted down onto you. She huffed while hopping up and down for a moment, knocking the wind clear out of you. Norah was merely giggling watching the small girl make little progress. "Now there's an idea, but let me show you how it's done!" you heard Norah boom out and your eyes shot open in fear.

Norah got up from the bed and let Tracy hop down before presenting her gigantic butt to you. It was wobbling and shaking menacingly even within the confines of Norah's tight leggings as Norah teased it against the suitcase a few times in preparation of something. "Here goes nothing!" She called before jumping and falling onto you. Not only was Norah far, far heavier than Tracy, she also had yet to shower or even change since that final yoga session this evening. So when Norah was grabbing the suitcase on each side and pulling herself into it with a determined rub down, you felt the life being squeezed from your body and were forced to endure the toxic taste and smell too. With a little help from Tracy, Norah's butt bomb had truly sealed the deal in trapping you in her suitcase.

Tracy took one last look at you in the shape of Norah's ass print before taking a gamble and pointing at you. "Taking mom's special towel home, are ya?"

Norah smacked her forehead, "Oh THAT'S where I got it! Oh, no. You don't think she'll miss it do you, dear?"

Tracy pondered how much her mom would investigate your disappearance, and answered Norah's question with complete honesty, "Probably, but it'll be our secret, kay?"

Norah pinched Tracy's cheek lightly and said "You're such a sweetheart, you know that. Thank goodness too, I really didn't want to part with this little rag. Nothing like it has been able to keep up with my yoga, it's like it was made for me!"

You felt the strong pressure from the suitcase but it wasn't anything you couldn't handle. You sighed a breath of relief to be free from Norah's ass for a moment before you remembered where you were and why you were there. You were headed to Norah's house. And she had no idea.

This prompted a new round of struggling and fighting but Norah and Tracy didn't notice a thing as Tracy carried you out to Norah's car. Tossing you into her trunk and brushing her hands from a job well done, Norah gave Tracy a huge hug and kiss before heading towards her car door. "Oh wait a second, where the heck is Hunter? I feel just awful leaving without giving him a goodbye kiss!"

Tracy bit her lip nervously, this was exactly what she was afraid of. Luckily she was ready, "I'm pretty sure he's been away at a friend's or something. Such a shame he's not here to see you off, he loves your kisses!" Tracy couldn't help but snicker recalling your detailed description of how overpowering and nauseating an Aunt Norah kiss was and how you avoided them at all costs.

"Awww that's a shame, I felt like he was right with us these past few weeks but I suppose looking back I can't really place how." Norah's face clouded for a moment before she cheered up, "Oh well! I'll just give him double kisses next time I see him! Love ya!"

If you could have heard a fraction of that conversation you would have cried out. But all you felt was the vibration of the car as it roared to life and Norah pulled out of your driveway. Tracy waved her car goodbye before breaking into a gut-busting laughing spree. You let loose a blood-curdling scream as every second of Norah's foot on the gas was another bit you were further from your home. From the place people knew who you were. Where people actually looked out for you, checking where they step and sit. Norah had none of these attributes. This could be a long trip from home.

After three quiet hours in the trunk of Norah's car, you felt the engine shut off and a moment later you were hoisted up in her arms. Getting into her home, Norah deposited her suitcase lazily at the foot of her bed before leaving it there to get a midnight snack. She truly left a little too late and after a long drive her stomach was growling. "Hmmmmmm...want something...sweet!" Norah mused as she popped open her freezer. Spotting exactly what her stomach was calling for, Norah got a bowl and took a big scoop out.

As the sweet and creamy flavors of the vanilla ice cream danced on her tongue, Norah felt some kind of tickle in the back of her mind. Was she forgetting something? As she took another large glob into her mouth, the tiny form of her nephew popped into her mind. She gushed, sweet ice cream and thoughts of such a sweet and helpful little guy swimming in her head. A hot wave of passion rose up her body as a ridiculous thought rolled through her mind...if only Hunter could come stay with her for some time. Sure her place was smaller than yours, but did it really matter to him? (Of course it did since it increased your chance of run-ins with clueless Norah). Licking the last drops from her bowl with her pointer finger, she sucked off the last of the sweet cream with a final thought that she'd propose the idea to your mom next time she was asked to babysit.

Washing her bowl and putting it away, Norah clicked her tongue savoring the aftertaste and having funny afterthoughts of her last idea. Suddenly Norah's heart beat accelerated at the thought of Hunter joining her for one of her yoga sessions. She bet you'd be so ridiculously accommodating you might even volunteer to wipe the sweat off her. To act as a...sweat...rag...

Norah raced up the stairs. It couldn't really be true, right? Tracy said he had been at a friend's house. But the pieces seemed to fit, the ice cream, the yoga, her thoughts of you. Prying open her suitcase she was feeling a turbulent mix of emotions. She wanted to see her favorite tiny nephew but also was worried he'd be upset if he truly had been her towel all that time. A tiny part of her was actually hoping she didn't have to make that grueling drive back to her sisters house too.

Light shone on you and Norah practically ripped her suitcase open. "Hunter?! Are you in here?!" You saw her face painted with a kind of anxious smile that made you wonder just what she was thinking...

114223.content:
“So, I’m curious about Norah’s job. What other kind of jobs did she have you fill in?” You could see in her eyes that “curious” could probably have been replaced with “angry”. Obviously Quinn cared a lot about people’s treatment of tinies, and hearing about Norah, unintentionally or otherwise, taking advantage of tiny guys seemed to make her pretty mad.

“Yeah, sure Quinn, let me think,” you put your hand on your chin and started to think, before thinking of a good one. “Ok, before I start this one I’ll remind you that most of what I went through on these jobs was not entirely Norah’s fault, she didn’t really know what she was getting me into most of the time.”

Quinn simply shrugged and stared at you expectantly. Clearly your reminder didn’t really sway her.

“Ok, so it all started when I was 16, after I had promised myself I wouldn’t help Norah out with these jobs anymore, she came to me with a listing she urgently needed to fill.”

(FLASHBACK START)

“No Aunt Norah, I’m sorry but I just don’t want to help out with this anymore! The last job you sent me on ended up with me being turned into a professional volleyball player’s insole for three weeks!” You whined up to Norah from your position on her open palm.

“But Hunter, if YOU don’t do this then I look bad to my bosses! I really need your help here,” Norah whined, pouting and gave you her best puppy-dog eyes. “I know the last job was horrible for you, but this one’s nothing like that! It’s just a cleaning job at a bowling alley, I swear no one will use you as clothing on this one. Plus the pay is super good, and on such short notice I can get you paid double! Please, please, please Hunter. I really need your help on this one!”
Norah didn’t happen to mention that her commission for this job would be much higher than what you’d be making on it, even with the double pay.

Norah’s pleading, along with her puppy-dog eyes, eventually wore you down. “Fine! I’ll do this one for you Aunt Norah, but only if you promise I won’t have to go near anyone’s feet for this one, I still get shivers whenever mom walks past me in bare feet after the last job.”

“Oh thank you so much Hunter! You’re really saving my ass here. I promise you won’t have to go anywhere near feet, or anything associated with feet, it’s just a cleaning job,” Norah’s smile beamed down towards you. She finished with a smirk. “I mean, come on. I’m not a complete scatterbrain.”

*****

“She is a complete scatterbrain,” you thought to yourself, enraged.
Somehow Norah had managed to misread “bowling alley shoe cleaner”, to just “bowling alley cleaner”. She had just convinced you to sign up to clean stinking bowling shoes for a week! On top of that, your work contract stipulated that you would stay on the premises for the whole week, so Norah had just dumped you on the counter and had just left you as you were going over the details in your head! You had no way of getting out of this.

As the swinging door closed behind your aunt as she left to go finish her morning jog, you were left to look up at the sneering face of your new boss for the week, Abby.
Abby was a short, thin woman who possessed a frame some would probably call cute. She was still massive in comparison to you, like every woman you encountered, but she did tower over you slightly less than most women. Her black hair was pulled back in a ponytail, and her brown eyes were framed by a pair of large, square glasses. Her freckled face was currently pulled into a sneer that told you she probably didn’t like tiny guys such as yourself very much. No wonder Norah told you their last cleaner just didn’t turn up one day, with a boss like Abby you didn’t even want to turn up on the first day.

“Let’s hope you do a better job than the last guy,” Abby looked down at you with her pointed nose held high in the air.
“I’m sure a little bug like yourself will feel right at home in amongst the shoes of us regular people. Well at least, you better be, because that’s where you’ll be sleeping while you’re working here.”
As she chuckled at her mean-spirited taunting, you stood there, flabbergasted. She actually expected you to sleep in the shoes that have been worn by probably hundreds of people? Norah owed you big time when you got out of here.

“So there’s a small bucket and cloth down there for you, as well as a tap designed for someone your size to use, so there is no need for you to bother me while you’re here. If you happen to be in a shoe when I rent it out to someone it’s on you to get back out and continue working. I’m not paying you to lay about in a shoe that’s being used, so if I find out that you have been I’ll dock your pay for that day, got it!

“You little things are only useful for certain things and this is one of them, so don’t mess it up or I won’t hesitate to find another use for you for the week, a few of the older shoes could use a new insole, and maybe I just “forget” about doing that and tell Norah that you just left without any warning,” as she finished her threats you were genuinely terrified, you had never met a woman who had such an open disdain for tiny guys like this. What had Norah roped you into?

“G-Got it B-Boss,” you stammered out, wanting nothing more than to get your head down and get this week over with as soon as possible.

“Good, finally Norah has found a little bug who knows his place,” Abby smiled down at you, seemingly content with your subservience. She roughly pinched your torso between two fingers and carried you behind the counter to the shoes rack. Even from this height and distance you could see the small bridges and ladders that were placed throughout the massive rack of shoes specifically for tiny guys such as yourself to move around between the shoes. You saw a small water tap and pump for cleaning products, as well as a small bucket and cloth at the bottom of the rack. Most importantly, however, you could almost see a literal cloud of stench and sweat rising off of the shoes lined out on the rack, there were hundreds of pairs of varying sizes. This would be a difficult, long week.

As you gathered your cleaning equipment, although calling a small piece of rag and a tiny sized bucket filled with water and cleaning products “equipment” may have been a stretch, you mentally prepared yourself for a week of nothing but smelling the stench of old foot sweat. Lowering yourself into the first shoe your senses were assaulted by what smelled like years worth of wear on these shoes. This was going to be a long week.

*****

Four days had passed. You had cleaned so many shoes you had lost count, and you were convinced you would never get the smell of feet out of your clothes, or even your own skin for that matter.

Abby fed you once a day, leaving a small corner of a sandwich on the ground near the water tap. Otherwise she interacted with you very little, except to occasionally throw out a belittling taunt every once in a while when there weren’t customers.
On occasion Abby would come by to inspect a shoe after she had saw you crawl out of it, clearly checking your work, before staring down at you with a neutral expression before grunting and placing it back on the rack, never actually commenting on the quality of your work. You assumed this meant it was good because she hadn’t made good on her threat to turn you into an insole yet.

You had a few close calls on the first night, almost getting trapped in a shoe that Abby was fetching for a customer, but you always managed to get out in time before Abby had picked it up each time. After that you learned to try and clean the extremely large or small shoes during busy times since they were less likely to be picked.
By this point you were incredibly tired and aching, it was gruelling work having to clean the shoes for the entirety of the bowling alley’s opening hours and the smell of feet constantly surrounding you made it difficult to sleep.

You just hoped you could get through the next few days without incident, then Norah would pick you up and you could get out of here with some compensation for your suffering.

1) You find the old cleaner, engrained into one of the insoles of the most used pair on the rack.
2) Abby decides that you have done a bad job today, you spend the rest of your time in this job as an insole.
3) Abby thinks you’re doing a good job, she has you clean her shoes as well.

11423.content:
“Uh, actually…” Quinn rubbed her chin and leaned back in her seat. “You kinda opened up a lot…more than I expected, Hunter.” Your new roommate closed her eyes and sighed. “I guess…I’d be willing to talk a bit about myself, too.”

You were taken aback by this, but equally intrigued by the prospect. “Oh, I wouldn’t want to force you to do so, Quinn. If you’re sure, then that’s okay, but–”

“Yeah, I’m good.” Quinn interrupted, though you could tell it was from nervousness and not from being rude.

Taking your cue, you sat back and smiled at your beautiful giantess roommate. “Alright. Go ahead!”

The black-haired girl’s lips curled up into a smile that vanished as soon as it appeared. “Sure. Well, basically, my childhood was pretty simple. I’m an only child, so it was just me and my mom for…well…as long as I can remember. No clue when dad skipped out, but I must’ve been only a few months old. Mom always said it was because he wanted a boy, not a ‘weak little girl’, in his words.”

You frowned. “I’m so sorry to hear that, Quinn.”

Quinn shrugged, with only a faint wetness in her eye telling you how she really felt. “It’s whatever. Anyway, my mom…uh, her name is Becky, by the way. She had to care for me all by herself, but she caught a lucky break when she started up an online retailer website with one of her good friends. She and her friend would buy stuff from all over, and sell it for a few bucks cheaper online. However, they’d ship it all across the country, so they’d earn back a profit from shipping costs added onto the customer’s totals.”

Quinn was rambling by this point, and sensing that she was, she stopped herself to breath and blush ever-so-slightly. You smiled gently, amused by seeing a different side of Quinn from her normally apathetic behavior. It was clear that she held great respect and love for her mother.

Resuming, Quinn cleared her throat. “Basically, it wasn’t long before her store was getting revenue from ads, and gaining traction. Blah blah. It’s now pretty popular, and my mom soon became the manager instead of a direct buyer and supplier. She’s actually got a small team of people who do the daily work. She pretty much just lives her own personal life each and every day, save for a few meetings or phone calls each week.”

You nodded, suitably impressed. “Wow, that’s great. What’s the website called?”

“It’s, uh, called Shipping Hero. The motto is ‘finding the heroic deals, and shipping them to wherever you may be’. Tacky, right?” Quinn rolled her eyes as she spoke, but you gaped.

“No way. Tracy and I used to use that site all the time. That’s crazy?” You laughed, and Quinn actually chuckled a bit too. A moment later, you motioned for Quinn to continued. “Okay, so, your mom’s job was awesome, huh?”

“Eh.” Quinn said, while reaching for her phone. “It meant she had pretty much everyday free to baby me and dote on me like I was a little kid. I mean, yeah, I guess I was at one point, but she is still way too clingy and lovey-dovey. It’s exhausting.” Quinn scrolled around on her phone. “Like, see, look at this, Hunter. Our last vacation to the local amusement park. Can you believe her?” Quinn leaned forward in her seat and shoved the phone towards you.

You had to take a step back to fully analyze the photo, as it was practically a movie theater screen at your size. Glancing over the photo, you were about to respond to Quinn when your jaw dropped. The picture showed Quinn and a woman who looked startlingly similar to her beside a cardboard cutout of an animal mascot. Quinn was wincing from embarrassment, while the older woman was grinning like a child, while also clad in a t-shirt that read “My Daughter Is a Sweet Angel”.

This humorous aspect contrasted sharply with the woman’s outrageously pronounced curves. Surpassing even Quinn, the woman’s breasts stretched her too-tight top to the extreme, and you could plainly see her abundantly large rear end even from the front. Her hourglass figure was immaculate and hard to look away from, and it now made perfect sense where Quinn had inherited her own blessedly bountiful body from. Some strand of curviness genes clearly ran in the Wallace family.

Tearing your eyes from Quinn’s mother, you met your roommate’s gaze and laughed. “She seems like an awesome woman!”
Though intended as a light-hearted remark, Quinn’s face feel. “You’d actually hate her, Hunter. Or rather…I guess she’d hate you.”

You paused, confused. “What do you mean, Quinn? Does she warm up slowly to strangers?”

Your titanic new friend laughed humorlessly. “No, I wish. Truthfully, she despises tinies. Finds them distasteful and gross. She’s said so herself, word for word. She never told me why she hated tinies so strongly…but god she made it really damn clear with her actions. The things I’ve seen her do…”

Quinn trailed off, and your blood ran cold. There was a haunted look in Quinn’s eye, and a part of you didn’t want her to elaborate on whatever memories she was reliving. The other part of you knew that Quinn should, so that she could get it off her chest and allow total transparency between her and yourself.

Continuing, Quinn looked at you and sighed. “See, I used to have a lot of tiny friends. As in, way more than my normal-sized friends. I spent everyday hanging out with the tinies from my neighborhood and school. Trouble was, my doting and clingy mother was never far off, and when she’d find out about my tiny friends…it wasn’t long before I’d never see them again. And if it wasn’t my mom, it was just fate itself screwing over every single tiny I’ve ever known. Wasn’t long before I had no more friends.”

You hardly knew what to say, and could only gently rest your hand on Quinn’s thumb (as her hand holding the phone was still lying on the bed beside you. Touched by your gesture, Quinn spared you a quick smile before continuing.

“It’s part of the reason I care so much about you guys being strong and capable.” Quinn elaborated. “I’ve seen too many people treat you like, frankly, pieces of shit. It HURTS, watching it happen, but I can’t save every tiny, and god help me if I make things worse by trying. What I CAN do, though, is treat you like equals, with respect and dignity, and help you to get tougher all on your own.”

This was a whole new side of Quinn, and you were floored. Someone who had seemed like a cut-and-dry case of nonchalant emo girl had broken into a million pieces, revealing the caring girl with forward-thinking ideas and a traumatic past dueling inside of her. Your new roommate was the single most incredible and interesting person you’d ever met in your life, and you felt a rush of awe and something a little bit more as you looked at her.

A long moment of silence hung in the air, before Quinn coughed and refocused herself. “Um, anyway…ask away, Hunter. I’ll tell whatever stories you want, the good and bad. Shoot.”
