11532112212122.content:
Over the next two days you, Morgan and Quinn began to research a way of quickly removing your usage license, but found that removing it would not be a simple matter. In fact, one article Morgan found said that removing a usage license could take weeks, or even months! Combining that with how focused Isabella seemed to be on forcing this on you, you wouldn’t be surprised if you were stuck with this thing for a year.

You had all been sitting around the kitchen table researching for the better part of the day, and frustration was starting to set in for all three of you.

“Ugh, I don’t think I can look at these anymore! I might need to call it for tonight guys,” Quinn sighed, rubbing her temples.

“Yeah girls, I’m beat as well. Maybe for the best that we just pick this back up tomorrow,” you agreed. You were worried about this situation sure, but you didn’t want your friends working themselves to death over it.

“Hunter, both Quinn and I have work tomorrow,” Morgan looked like she was losing hope. “So we won’t be able to get very much research done. Plus Isabella could show up any day now! We might need to face the fact that until this is fixed, someone is going to have to use you.”

As Morgan looked at you sympathetically, you sighed.
“Yeah I figured this was going to be the likely outcome,” you rubbed the back of your neck.

“Are we finally seeing sense and wearing the little cutie like he so obviously wants to?” Avery peaked her head into the kitchen. “May as well just give him to me now and I’ll have him as a totes cute thong in no time!”

You all sighed at the pink haired girls misreading of the situation.
“Avery, I’ve already told you. I don’t want anyone to wear me. Your eagerness to turn me into a thong probably would make you the last person I’d choose!” You snapped at Avery without meaning to. Your bubbly, pink haired roommate looked crestfallen, clearly you had hurt her feelings. Even Quinn and Morgan looked slightly taken aback by your outburst. Feeling bad, you looked at Avery, a slight wetness in her eyes.
“Avery, I’m-,“ before you could continue, Avery stormed off. You heard a door slam upstairs.

“Jeez dude, that was harsh,” Quinn remained completely deadpan as she said this. She clearly understood why you snapped, but she clearly felt bad for Avery.

“I know, I didn’t mean it,” you looked up to Morgan and Quinn, regret painted on your face. “You think she’ll be ok?”

“Yeah Hunter, she’ll get over it,” Morgan reassured you. “But for now we’ve got more important matters to attend to. We need to find someone who would be willing to use you to keep Isabella at bay while we get through all this paperwork. I don’t think Quinn or I are too comfortable with using you, and you obviously would rather not have Avery do it. Any ideas who we could ask?”

“Hmmm, we’ll obviously I trust my mom and Tracy, but I’d rather avoid using them if possible. They’d both do it in a heartbeat to help me, but I don’t want to put Tracy through that and my mom might see this whole situation as my fault and see fit to punish me for it.

“Aunt Norah is another option, but I’d rather avoid her as well if I can, she’d likely mould me into something and forget about me after a while. I’d rather not spend a few months as her insole or something like that because she forgot I was there. Do you guys have any ideas?”

As you looked at your roommates, Morgan seemed to think about it for a moment. Quinn shook her head.
“Sorry Hunter, but you definitely wouldn’t want to be given to my mom. She hates tinies so if we gave you to her the usage license would be the last of your worries,” Quinn’s words filled you with no small amount of fear at the prospect of ending up with her mother.

Looking to Morgan, she began to speak.
“I mean I guess we could give you to mine and Avery’s moms. They love tiny guys, and I doubt they’d forget you. They can be a little overbearing in their affections, but they are always an option I suppose,” you could see a hint of apprehension in Morgan’s eyes as she spoke about giving you to her parents, but you passed it off as her being slightly embarrassed by her parents or something like that.

Left with the choices arrayed in front of you, you thought long and hard about it. Eventually you came to a decision, and looked up to Morgan and Quinn, who were looking at you expectantly.

“Ok, I’ve made a decision,” you sighed. Not liking the prospect of being worn by this person at all, but you didn’t have any other choices. “I’ve decided that I should be given to...”

1) “...one of my family members.” You are given to either Helen, Norah or Tracy.
2) “...Morgan’s parents.” Morgan takes you to her parents house and explains the situation to Mariah and Lilyana, before leaving you there. After finding out where you went, Avery might decide to “tell the truth” to her moms, maybe leading to a change in their treatment of you.
3) “...none of them. Can we think of someone else?” (Writers choice)

1153211222.content:
You awoke, and after taking a moment to breath deeply and calm yourself down, you could hear the faint sounds of laughter and waves crashing, and realized that you were once more in Quinn’s bag, being carried along to work at Sanderson Beach. Sure enough, after a minute, your pocket was unzipped, and Quinn lifted you out.

Looking down at you, Quinn noted your shaken expression and frowned. “You’re really worried about this, huh?” She asked, a hint of genuine compassion in her voice. “Look, Hunter, I think that License stuff is bullshit and frustrating. I knew a few tinies once who signed up because they were low on cash, and the last I ever saw them, this bratty cheerleader at our high school had them glued to her boobs like pasties for over four months. Of course, according to law, it was all ‘legal’.”

You paled at Quinn’s story, and began quivering in fear. “Y-you don’t think…that…” You began, but Quinn cut you off.

“Hell no, Hunter. You’re under my care while we’re hear at the beach.” Quinn’s expression was blazing with righteous fury. “Until this License mess is sorted, I’m telling Brigitte that you WILL NOT leave my sight each day. I swear.”

Your accelerating panic attack slowed down, and you flashed Quinn a grateful smile. To your surprise, she actually returned it, and it was one of the few times you could recall seeing her actually smile so far.

Quinn began walking, and resumed talking as she did so. “In fact, we’re headed to Brigitte’s office right now. She requested to speak to us, and told me not to change for some reason. Maybe she finally has a replacement for my too-small bikini. Regardless, I’m letting her know that your safety comes first. She’ll be understanding, count on it.”

“Thank you for doing all of this, Quinn. It means a lot.” You said to her, and though she didn’t respond with more than a curt nod, you could’ve sworn the lightest trace of pink flushed her cheeks for a split second before disappearing.

When the two of you reached Brigitte’s office, you found your new boss seated at her desk, and frowning at her computer. As Quinn walked in, Brigitte glanced up, and her frown only deepened. As she locked eyes with you, the light in her eyes dimmed a bit. You weren’t totally sure, but it seemed as if she was displaying signs of…anxiety? Apprehension? Guilt, maybe?

Quinn took a seat in front of Brigitte’s desk, and placed you down on the edge of her boss’s desk. Noting her superior’s apparent unease, Quinn furrowed her brow. “What’s up, Brigitte? You wanted to see us? Truth is, I had something to say to.”

Brigitte’s eyes widened, and she breathed out, seemingly releasing a breath she’d been holding for a while. “O-oh? Is that right? Go ahead, shoot. I’ll…uh…explain myself after you speak.”

Quinn shrugged. “Okay, sure. Basically, I just wanted to request Hunter as my partner for the next few weeks. I wanted him up in the lifeguard stand with me, or by my side during patrols.” Your black-haired roommate glanced at you, then back to Brigitte. “He had a…less than enjoyable first day, and would feel safer as close to me as possible.”

Hearing the phrase ‘close to me as possible’ caused Brigitte to shift uncomfortably in her chair, and the redhead seemed to be at a loss for words for a moment until finally composing herself. Looking at her computer, then at you, and finally at Quinn, she spoke again. “Well, that shouldn’t be too much of a problem…in a way.”

You spoke up. “That’s great, thank you!”

Brigitte bit her lip, and waited an uncomfortably long time before speaking again. “See, thing is…I actually got an email late last night. I checked again to make sure it was real this morning. From what I can see on my end, Hunter has applied for, and been accepted for a General Use License. All the paperwork is here on the screen, and legit.”

You felt your fears rising, and you stammered out a reply. “W-well, th-that’s not actually…”

Quinn, unintentionally, cut off your explanation with her own. “No, ma’am, Hunter was…”

Brigitte silenced both of you by raising your hand. “Look, guys. I’m sorry, but it doesn’t matter. From your expressions, it seems like maybe this was all a big mishap, but the paperwork is genuine. This License has to be treated as real and applicable to any foreseeable situation. Until it can be officially revoked…which I hear is a huge pain.”

Your giantess partner seethed in her chair, angry at the women from yesterday, not Brigitte, who’s hands were tied. “Just because the License is real…for now…doesn’t mean we have to do anything with–”

“Speaking of that…” Brigitte leaned back in her chair, and pulled an envelope out of a drawer. She dropped the envelope onto her desk in front of Quinn, letting the contents spill out. Inside the envelope were about thirty little slips of folded paper. “…I found notes like these in the Sanderson Beach tips and complaints box all this past week. These thirty are from yesterday ALONE.”

Quinn, confused, sifted through the pieces of paper, pausing to read a few. After glancing at them, a full, beet red blush ignited in her cheeks, and her eyes widened. You’d never seen Quinn look so taken aback by anything before. She was utterly speechless.

Brigitte sighed. “Ten of these paper slips are from beach goers complaining about your risqué uniform, Quinn. Mostly families and older people saying that you’re setting a bad example for children. The other twenty slips are, frankly, quite lecherous. Perverts and the like complimenting your…ahem…‘crazy hella fine ass’ and ‘bouncing bubble butt’. It’s pretty gross.”

To your amazement, Quinn actually sank into her seat from embarrassment. “I-I can’t help it. I’m just shaped this way…AND it’s that dumb suit’s fault. It’s too small!” Quinn was a bit frantic now, probably trying too hard to save face. It was almost cute, if you didn’t have a growing sense of dread building inside of you over what was about to happen.

“Exactly my point, Quinn.” Brigitte nodded, and she began to slowly move forward, leaning over her desk. Momentarily distracted by your boss’ huge, firm breasts and lean abdomen, you were caught off guard as the towering redhead scooped you up into her palm and held you tightly. The action also snapped Quinn out of her flustered spiral, and she sat up attentively.

“Wait, Brigitte, what are you…” You tried to say, before being silenced by Brigitte gently but forcibly smushing your head flat.

Brigitte shrugged her shoulders. “I don’t know all the details here, but this seems like the win-win situation to me. Hunter as a General Use License now, making it perfectly legal for him to serve his position here at Sanderson Beach by being molded into replacement bikini bottoms for you. Just as long as it takes until we get a new, proper fitting suit for you, Quinn. Besides, the General Use License, when used in a work setting, ups his hourly pay. Again, win-win!”

Quinn was floored. “Wha…Brigitte! He’s a living being like us. He doesn’t want to be my bikini bottoms!” Quinn paused, and began blushing again. “And I don’t want to have to wear Hunter for–”

“Look, his License says what his License says.” Brigitte frowned. “This might be weird for you at first, but you just need to change your thinking. By law, he’s property now, remember?”

Quinn’s eyes nearly bulged from her skull, and she sneered at her boss. “You can’t seriously believe that?”

Brigitte shook her head. “No, I like that little dude, but it’s factual law. Not only do we need to abide by his License, but this will also solve your dress code issue. No more rude comments or worrying complaints from beach goers, and no more discomfort for you. I mean, I’m sure you know how stretchy tinies are. He’ll fit you well.”

“Ma’am…”

“At the end of the day…I’m your boss, Quinn. I’m telling you this is going to happen.” The giantess redhead looked sullen for a moment. “I’m sorry, but all you could do is quit to avoid this. Even still, Hunter would remain employed here, and I’m sure his License would be useful for other purposes.”

Your giantess roommate looked utterly defeated, and she sank back in defeat. Sparing you a heart wrenching look of dismayed acceptance, she nodded at Brigitte’s proposal. A huge smile came back to the normally energetic redhead’s beautiful face.

“Great! Awesome!” Brigitte smiled. “This’ll be over before you know it, Quinn. As soon as we get a replacement suit for you, Hunter is off the hook. And, as soon as his License is revoked, if that’s what the little dude wants, he’s free to go back to normal work.” Brigitte began flattening you by clenching her palm. “Besides, you two get what you wanted, right? He’ll be ‘as close to you as possible’, remember? It’s perfect!”

Crunched up in Brigitte’s hand, you felt your spirits fall to despairing lows. This day had truly become the nightmare those two evil women from yesterday had promised it would be. Your License in full effect, you were nothing but property by law now. Brigitte’s last statement, innocent as it had been, stung particularly harsh. You had wanted to partner with Quinn to avoid THIS exact scenario, but fate had screwed you over in the end.

11532112221.content:
Brigitte continued to look at Quinn pleasantly, all while mangling your body between her powerful hands. More than muscular enough to easily dominate you, Brigitte reduced you into a paper-thin flat disc in seconds, and was now smearing you into a larger and larger circular shape with an annoying level of casual carelessness. Though she said that she genuinely liked you as an employee (and you believed her deep down) Brigitte was taking to using your License quite quickly.

“So, I’m going to have to delay you for a few more minutes, Quinn.” Brigitte explained. Quinn, who could barely stop from wincing at your treatment, slowly pried her gaze away from you and towards her boss.

“Uh…what do you mean?” She asked, fighting hard to slip back into her normal apathetic attitude. She hated what was happening to you, but couldn’t think of any way to change it. Brigitte’s points made perfect sense, and the law was the law, as much as Quinn despised it. Your black-haired roommate was also a bit afraid (though she’d never admit it) of disappointing her boss by maintaining a combative or sulky demeanor.

Brigitte rummaged around on her desk and retrieved her phone, then began typing the number pad before replying to Quinn. “Basically, I’m shit at anything related to design. If I tried to make Hunter into your replacement bikini bottoms myself, it’d be a mess.” Brigitte laughed heartily. “Thankfully, Natasha is much more skilled than I am, so let me call her real quick and she’ll drive over.”

Quinn nodded. “Ah, okay.” It took her a second, but Quinn recalled Brigitte mentioning before that she lived with her girlfriend, Natasha, in a spacious apartment not far from the beach. Natasha was, if Quinn was remembering correctly, a part-time fashion designer. After a moment of ringing, Natasha picked up, though Quinn could only hear Brigitte’s side of the conversation.

Brigitte lit up excitedly, presumably from hearing her girlfriend’s voice. “Ah, Natasha! Still at home?” A pause. “Uh huh, I need your help in the office. Little bit of styling and designing. Got a Usage License tiny for ya to mold into bikini bottoms!” Another pause. “Yes, babe, I know, you feel kinda weird about it, but you’re so damn good, baby.” One more pause. “Yes, paperwork’s all taken care off. It’ll be easy, and I’ll buy dinner tonight to make it up to you. Love ya!”

Brigitte hung up, then laid your pancaked body down on her desk. She then casually dropped a heavy notebook atop you, pressing you down hard onto her desk and ensuring you were unable to reform in the time that passed before Natasha arrived. The redhead giantess then leaned back in her chair and drummed her fingers on her desk. Quinn fought to keep her face neutral.

“So, I’ve got a few ideas for reorganizing volleyball competitions after the west nets broke…” Brigitte began, engaging your roommate in conversation. Able to slip into more normal work patterns, Quinn tried her best to ignore you and conversed rather pleasantly with Brigitte for the next fifteen minutes, passing the time amicably while you fought uselessly to wiggle out from under Brigitte’s notebook.

Eventually, Natasha arrived, and she swept into the room with a grin on her face, a skip in her step, and about a million art and design supply bags under her arms. Dropping the bags in an empty chair, Natasha giggled as she was swept up into Brigitte’s arms and kissed passionately.

Quinn was momentarily taken aback by Natasha. She vaguely noted that Natasha was African American, with curly brown hair that framed her face, and that she was exceptionally pretty. What threw her off was that Natasha was no more than 5’2”. Her short height was almost comedic in comparison to Brigitte’s towering form, and as it was, the muscular redhead easily lifted her girlfriend and spun her around.

Setting Natasha back down, Brigitte composed herself and then removed the notebook from atop your body. Gesturing to you, Brigitte retook her seat. Sobering up, Natasha approached the desk and gently scooped you up into her hands. Her delicate, artist’s hands rubbed and massaged your body, poking and prodding at you. Natasha bit her lip gently.

“Well, he’ll definitely work just fine. Soft and stretchy enough to fit even Quinn.” Natasha explained, causing Quinn to briefly blush at the offhand reference to her curvaceousness. Natasha didn’t seem to notice, though, and in fact went straight to using her sharp fingernails to tear your clothes off, leaving you totally nude in her hands. “He’ll need to be naked for the dye to work.”

Quinn furrowed her brow. “Dye? What’s that for?”

Natasha pulled a few bottles from her bag, as well as a medium-sized bowl. “Fabric dye is needed to dye…uh…this tiny dude…the same red color as all of our lifeguard uniforms.” Natasha glanced at her girlfriend. “Though it should be noted that the dye can permanently affect the tiny’s skin tone. Only the solvent liquid will restore his skin tone to normal. You DO have some in stock, right?”

Brigitte nodded vaguely. “Uh, definitely. I saw a few bottles in the storage room…last month or something.” She trailed off, and neither Quinn nor Natasha heard her last comment.

“Good enough for me.” Natasha smiled, before dumping a red bottle of fabric dye into her bowl. She mixed in a few other liquids, and then finally submerged your body into the bowl. You mentally screamed out as the cool liquid soaked and sloshed all around you, covering you entirely. Crumpled up as you were, you couldn’t do a thing to fight Natasha, and soon you were fully drowned in the bowl.

The giantesses left you to stew in the bowl for ten minutes, Quinn sparing you a glance every so often, but finally Natasha retrieved you. When she did so, you caught a brief glimpse of yourself in the reflection of a mirror on the wall, and found to your utter horror that your body was entirely dyed bright red. Every inch of your skin tone had been changed to a bright red color, with not a trace of your normal tan shade remaining.

“Ah, perfect!” Natasha grinned. She hastily plugged in a small blow-dryer into the wall and dried off the remnants of the dye from your body. She then laid you out onto Brigitte’s desk and grabbed some white fabric paint and a brush from her bag. She’d laid you onto the desk face first, so you couldn’t tell what was coming next, but you instinctively winced as you felt the dripping brush dabble white paint onto your back.

Quinn leaned forward to watch, morbidly curious. “What are you doing, Natasha?”

Natasha winked at Quinn. “Ever wonder who designed that cute little logo that Sanderson Beach uses? It was yours truly!” She beamed brightly. “I’m just sketching it onto these bikini bottoms real quick. The white color will pop out, and the fabric paint will fuse to the bottoms, preventing it from scratching or fading. It’ll also be waterproof!”

Quinn frowned at hearing the phrase ‘fuse to’, and your own heart plummeted with despair. Still, both you and she were powerless in this situation, and could only let Natasha do her work. Brigitte looked on proudly as Natasha painted the Sanderson Beach logo onto your back: a cute picture of a sandy beach, volleyball net, and bright sun.

Finished drawing, Natasha gently blew on you to dry the paint, along with another go with the blow-dryer. She then turned to Quinn, retrieved a tape measure from her bag, and noted the measurements of Quinn’s prodigious posterior, hips, and thighs for good measure. With all her notes in place, it was time for the final excruciating step.

Picking you up, Natasha tentatively pulled at your malleable body, a huge smile spreading on her face. “Oh, this material is just the BEST for clothing!” She gushed, apparently already forgetting you were a living person at this point, too caught up in the excitement of her craft.

Over the next fifteen minutes, Natasha worked at a feverish pace, not letting up for an instant. She pushed, pulled, stretched, squished, and molded your tiny body into the world’s most perfect bikini bottoms. Your arms and legs served as the loops for Quinn’s legs to go through, your face made up the inside back of the bottoms, and your lower half the inside front. Natasha sealed the deal with a thin but extra-durable layer of waterproof superglue to seal your limbs in place, completing the job.

Exhausted, Natasha sat back and handed you to Brigitte. Brigitte eyed you excitedly, immensely proud at the work of her girlfriend. Satisfied beyond any doubt, Brigitte tossed you to Quinn, who caught you gently. Your black-haired partner spared you a sympathetic look, but you barely noticed. The fabric dye and mushing and mashing from Natasha had really mangled your face, causing your vision to be blurry.

Brigitte cleared her throat. “So, normally, you’d wear the standard one-piece uniform. However, until we get your replacement, use those bottoms every day, and just wear a Sanderson Beach lifeguard t-shirt over whatever top you want. Sound good?”

Quinn nodded numbly. “Um…sounds great, ma’am.”

“Awesome! Then go get changed and head out, we’re behind schedule! Don’t worry, I won’t dock you pay for this.” Brigitte laughed, then turned to flirting with Natasha. Ugh, it all makes so much sense now.” Norah’s idiotic rant drove fear straight into your heart. In no shape or form did the countless hours you spent decimated under her body make you begin to feel any level of genuine attraction to the woman who was tormenting you. Of course you always knew Norah was objectively an attractive woman, but that still never meant that you wanted to be romantically involved with her! Once more you begged for your mouth to open up so you could explain, but it couldn’t, instead Norah’s words filled the silence once more.

“I hope I’m not breaking your tiny little heart Hunter but I just don’t see you the same way. Especially now with your usage license, I really consider you more of an object than anything else now. And don’t get me wrong you’re the sweetest most helpful item I’ve ever owned, but it would be kind of weird to try to date a random useful thing, right? I mean imagine if I tried to start a relationship with a tissue or a sock or something! That would be pretty strange!” Norah said, stunning you once more with how unknowingly callous she was acting towards your existence. Clearly she still liked you as a family member, but at the same time she was quite literally referring to you as an object and directly comparing you to tissues and socks. You couldn’t believe your ears. The last thing you needed was Norah to start forgetting to treat you like a human, and it seemed like that was on the way.

“I promise I’ll uphold our contract together and use you as much as you want to be used! Eventually your feelings towards me will fade away, Hunter, I promise that too. Maybe if I stop holding back and really push you to your limits you can see a bit of the grosser side of me or something! Like, I know my ass looks nice and all but it can literally become a swamp at the drop of a hat. Look!” Norah stood up and struggled to shimmy her sweat-soaked, stretched shorts free from her cheeks. But in a moment she did, each of her globes popping free and jiggling like no tomorrow. Then came the true horror. With her shorts sitting just below her cheeks, Norah grabbed your upper body with her other hand and stretched you out roughly, drastically increasing your surface area into a still relatively small rectangle. Without another word she slammed your now square body into her doughy cheek and your body’s absorbent qualities immediately went to work. You felt her warm, salty sweat begin to soak into every square millimeter of your current towel-like form as she scrubbed one cheek, then the other, before finally plunging you aggressively between her buns. Nearly her entire hand disappeared up to her wrist in her crack, with you miles deeper. In here you felt the true source of the river of sweat that had been soaking her entire ass. And in mere moments your cursed body had sponged every drop of it up. Norah then pulled you out and swiped a hand across her now dry ass, her eyes opening wide with surprise.

“Holy cow, Hunter, I forgot how good you are at that. My ass is never this dry!” Norah exclaimed, clearly briefly forgetting the point of what she just did to you. After a moment more of amazement it seemed like she resumed her train of thought, “Oh yeah, but see how nasty that was?! I promise I’ll use you for all of the nastiest uses I can think of and your feelings for me will fade away in no time! Plus I get to really use your awesome little body to the fullest, a win-win for both of us!”

Norah was ecstatic with her idiotic plan. She felt like she was now somehow doing you a favor by exposing you to some sort of even grosser side of her that she thought you weren’t aware of. You cursed god, cursed the shrinking pandemic from before you were born, anything you could think of at that moment as you felt your rag-like body dangle lifelessly and soaked through with sweat from Norah’s ass crack. With Norah’s mind set to scrub away your perceived romantic feelings for her by forceful exposure to her darkest needs, your future seemed quite bleak.

“Okay, Hunter, this is for your own good. I would say I’m sorry but I know deep down you still want to be useful to me no matter what. I am sorry for accidentally leading you on for so long though, I hope you can find it in your heart to forgive me someday for that. But for now, let’s work on Operation Gross Exposure! I think the next thing you should experience should be…”
11532112233123222.title: Misunderstood Affection

choices: …home, to start the first day of the rest of your lives together.
…to your apartment, to let your roommates know your new status.
…to her sister’s house, to explain your situation to your mother.
1153211223313.content:
“…my hairband.” The smile that slipped onto Norah’s face with that comment was apologetic, though not for the reasons you may have hoped. “I know it’s probably a bit tame for you but I promise it will just be temporary. Give me some time to think and I’ll come up with something much better.” She bit her lip at that, her eyes twinkling with a combination of child-like joy and a deep-seated desire to make you hers. “Ah, but, you did select accessory as a favourite as well, so hopefully this will be fun for you anyway. I know I’ll enjoy just having you with me and knowing you’re mine.”

This was bad. Really bad. The gentle and affection smile on your aunt’s face made you want to cry out in frustration as her warm hands continued to run across your body, kneading and stretching as she continued to chew at her lip. You knew that if you could just make her understand that you hated this, that you didn’t want to be used, that she would stop. That she loved you enough not to take advantage of Isabella’s cruelty. But you also knew that even if you could speak to her, with the way your luck usually ran she would likely misunderstand. So many times in the past you had been mistaken as a willing little man ready to serve her needs. By now, the idea of her nephew as a boy who would do anything to help her was firmly planted in Norah’s subconscious. A self-reinforcing belief that would have readily seen you used by her even without your new permanent licence.

Though you were glad that your initial use would be as something less intense that you had feared, you knew that it was only the prelude for what was to come. Already the blush on the redhead’s face was intense enough that it was reaching her ears, and her breath was coming out in short hot pants as she raised you to her face, bathing you in warmth. You shuddered at what may come as you tried to speak, but already Norah’s fingers were at work on your body, and you didn’t even have the chance to make a peep before her thumb blurred your mouth into uselessness. Grasping hands were slick with nervous sweat as they grasped your limbs and pulled, stretching you out before beginning to twist your arms and legs together as a single mass. The thumb descended once more, and what was left of your face was pushed down into your chest, smoothing out your features until it was no longer clear which end was which, only your eyes remaining intact enough to provide a tiny clue.

As she worked, Norah began to speak again, her voice hushed and intended for you alone. “It must have taken a lot of bravery to be so honest with what you wanted Hunter. I’m so proud of you.” She sighed, a self-deprecating sound. “I’ve been such a coward. Even though you were always so helpful to me, I could never admit that I… that I have always been interested in you. Not just as my darling little nephew, but as a tiny man who has done so much for me and who I… who I just wanted to have all to myself.” She sucked her lower lip for a moment, leaving it slightly red as her dexterous fingers began to twist and pinch your body into a more cylindrical form. “Every time you agreed to take on one of my jobs I couldn’t help but think that I didn’t want to share you. That you were just for me.”

All of Norah’s fingers were working together now, pulling and stretching to form you into a broader circle as she continued to spill her heart to her ‘willing’ nephew. “I always told myself that I mustn’t. That family was more important than whatever my base instincts might be telling me to do. Even if part of me always knew you wanted it as well.” She smiled again, soft and loving and chilling you to the bone. “There were so many times when I would find you beneath me, or stuck to something of mine, or replacing something of mine. So many ‘accidents’.” She chuckled. “I was such a fool.”

You could well remember many of those so-called ‘jobs’ Norah had sent you on, and had you been given the option back then to go on the job or just stay with your aunt, you would have picked the redhead in an instant. But, you had never realised back then that these kinds of thoughts were being directed towards you, and now you wondered just what could have happened to you back then if things had gone differently. You rapidly began to review years of past discussions, wondering just where you had gone wrong to generate the lingering basis of such an ingrained delusion. Was this the result of Tracy’s actions from back then? Or had these thoughts been there from the start?

You tried to wriggle, to pass on some kind of message at least, but Norah was already pulling her hair back into a loose bun with one hand, as the other brought you closer and she placed a single lingering kiss on your stretched-out form. The remains of your face and half your chest where pressed into the pillowy mass of the redhead’s lips as a blast of warm air washed over you from a single shaky breath. Then you were moving again as you were brought around behind your new owner and slipped around the waiting bun, your last view of the outside world being a bird’s eye view of the bulbous booty below before you snapped into place and everything went dark.

This wasn’t the first time Norah had used her cute nephew as an object, knowingly or otherwise, but this time she felt a pleasant chill run up her spine as she let go and confined you to her hair. Before it had always been a temporary thing. Even when you had agreed to days or weeks of use there had always been a time limit to dread. Now though, there was no longer any need to hold back. More than that, there was a legal imperative for her to act. To not use you would be to violate your rights in accordance with Baker’s Law. To deny you the right to be what you wanted to be. Before, a misguided sense of propriety had held her back. Now better informed, it compelled her to act.

“I’m sorry you had to go so far as to get this licence to make me see Hunter.” Hands now free, your aunt retrieved the licence from her pocket and ran her thumb across it with a sense of reverence, pausing as the digit came to rest on your own tiny card embedded in her own. “But I promise, from now on I’m going to do everything you want me to do. You’ll come with me everywhere, be with me always, and I’ll use you for everything I can.” Hazel eyes ran down the seemingly endless list once more as warmth filled her at just how much you wanted to be with her. “I swear, we won’t miss a single thing on this list. Even if it takes the rest of my years, I’ll make you as happy as I can.”

You tried desperately to respond, but even as you managed to produce a slight vibration you knew it was hopeless. The cushioning layer of your aunt’s hair rendered such slight movements meaningless, and even had she felt them she would likely have thought you were trembling in joy. Every word she spoke drove you further into despair as you realised there may never again come a time when someone would treat you as an actual person. That as far as the rest of the world, and the law, was concerned, you were Norah’s property now. An object to be used as she saw fit. Even her kind words did nothing to lift your spirits, knowing her fundamental misunderstandings would turn that goodwill against you. The last words spoken by your aunt as she moved to leave was a gentle “I love you” that made you want to cry. After all, the one thing that wasn’t on that list was a request to be human.

Isabella raised her head as your aunt stepped back into her office, suppressing a smirk at the blush still colouring the older woman’s face and the fact that you were nowhere to be seen. “All set? Already putting the little guy to good use?” In response, the redhead turned her head slightly to show off her hair, indicating your location with a shy smile. The corrupt licensing officer was a bit disappointed with such a tame use but smiled slyly as Norah went on to explain that she was keeping you there while she made plans for the future, and that you would get much more use later. To your aunt, it was confirmation that she would follow the law. To Isabella it was music to her ears.

It would forever surprise you how people could smile so maliciously without being suspected of ill-content. “We’ll send out a notification to anyone who received a copy of the previous general licence to let them know of the change. Just so there won’t be any trouble.” Or, more accurately, to make sure that there was no way you could weasel out of this. Isabella motioned to Norah like she was going to share some deep secret, before speaking again in a more conspiratorial tone. “If you ask me, you’ve got a great one there. I was a bit worried about him wanting to select everything like that, but he was adamant that you were deserving of his everything. I talked him into accepting a general licence temporarily while he thought about it overnight, but his conviction hadn’t changed.” It took all her self-control to keep from laughing as your aunt’s face lit up with obvious glee.

You wished you had the strength to kill Isabella in that moment, wondering what kind of monster could do this to someone just for having the gall to call her and her friend on their obvious lies. Her behaviour seemed so practiced. So assured. Who else had she doomed to this fate? How many of the Baker’s Law tinies in these parts were begging for release as they suffered at the hands of their misled tormentors? While you screamed inside, in the world beyond the women were all smiles as they parted, though Norah’s face was still burning red as she stepped outside and took a deep breath. A shaking hand raised to lay against her chest and feel the rapid beat of her heart as she smiled softly and thought of you, and just how much you had gone through to make sure she was happy. To make sure both of you were. The joyous laugh that escaped her then was one of a woman who had found her purpose in life, and there was a skip to her steps as she headed…
1153211223313.title: Tied Up with Norah

choices: Morgan finds a license loophole, and has your time reduced. How's Norah react?
Avery takes Norah up on her offer, but can you speak to her?
11532112233132.content:
You felt the strong inertia of jogging as your new owner bounded down the road somewhere. If only you weren't sealed to this redhead's hair with your face on the inside, you'd have some idea where you were headed but unfortunately you could only wonder. You gulped, if your aunt was headed straight home that would make her and Isabella the only people on the planet who knew you were legally chained to being Norah's property. Of course Isabella had to cover her tracks and notify everyone of the cancellation of your general use license, now not even your family would think anything of it besides it being a simple paperwork mistake. You could only pray that Norah would be as loud and forthcoming as possible with your family to reveal to them you were in this predicament...that is if they even questioned it.

Shaking the horrifying thought from your mind you heard Norah's cheery voice call out, "Oh hey Hunter, let's make a stop at your old apartment; I'd hate for your roommates to wait up when you won't be needing the space anymore!" Norah giggled to herself as she noted how little space you took up anyway. Still, she wanted to tie up any loose ends she could for you, to make sure there were as few interruptions as possible in fulfilling all of your deep, dark desires. It would be nice to get some more congratulations on her sort of...union as well. A bright red blush filled Norah's cheeks as she thought of how good that sounded to hear you two tied together. With a perky pace, Norah hurried towards your old domicile; wanting to get home both before dark and as soon as possible to have more time with you.

You cheered mentally as you heard Norah's mention of seeing your roommates. With how things went this morning, you knew for sure they'd be able to clear things up. You finally felt a glimmer of hope return to your mind as you imagined responsible Morgan tearing you from your overly attached aunt and letting you feel like a human again. You felt the hair around you grow a bit damp from Norah working up a good sweat on her run, and you winced praying that moment would come as soon as possible.

Finally reaching the steps of the apartment, Norah was panting hard and dripping on the doormat of your(former) apartment. Knocking, Norah waited for a moment before the shining face of Avery filled the frame as she opened the door. "Norah! Welcome back!" Avery was as warm and welcoming as ever despite the fact she had just met Norah that morning.

Norah, despite her fatigue, returned a bright smile and responded, "Ahhh, Avery! Short shift today? I was worried no one would be home and I'd have to leave a note." You winced imagining your very fate laying in the hands of a flimsy scrap-paper-note left on your door. A strong gust of wind would've been the difference between years of serving Norah or a bright future.

"Oh yea, nothing too much today. You look exhausted! Why don't you come in and get some water?" Norah graciously accepted and stepped in, following Avery to the kitchen with you bouncing along behind her. "You really worked up quite the sweat, you'll have to show me your routine some day!" Of course these two scatter-brains were getting along swimmingly as they made small talk about yoga and cardio. As Norah caught her breath and re-hydrated, you felt a tug against your leg as Norah grasped at you.

"Oh yeah, we can totally do a session someday! I bet yoga could be an amazing help in your modeling with enough effort!" As Norah spoke she was casually pulling you wider and wider until you went from a band to a wide flat square. Running you along her arms and chest to lap at her dripping perspiration, Norah was continuing to chatter on as Avery interrupted, "Woah, wasn't that your hairband a second ago? What is that, some new MicroFlex tech?"

Norah nervously giggled, that familiar blush returning to her face as she withdrew her usage license with one hand while getting to rubbing you along her waist methodically with her other. Presenting it proudly to Avery, Avery's jaw dropped in shock as she read the tiny print. "Oh. My. God. You didn't!" Hearing Avery's reaction made you sigh in relief even while getting a mouthful of Norah sweat. Wouldn't be long now until this was all straightened out...

"That is amazing! I'm so happy for you two! It's so rare a tiny finds someone they're willing to sign themselves over to. And woah, forever at that!" Easily excitable Avery wasn't even beginning to think that maybe this was some misunderstanding as she leapt at Norah, enveloping her in a great big hug despite Norah's current soaked state. The girls were giddily jumping in each other's embrace, all while you were mushed between them getting flatter by the second as their overwhelmingly bountiful chests smothered you constantly.

Interrupting their mini party, Morgan and Quinn arrived home from work and walked in on their embrace in the kitchen. "Woah, what's going on in here? And who's this?" Quinn asked plainly but with a genuine curiosity.

Finally breaking from her hug, Avery introduced Norah and she happily showed off her new usage license. While Norah peeled you off her chest sheepishly, Morgan and Quinn's jaws dropped but this time for the actual right reasons. Collecting their thoughts, the girls made their way to the living room where Norah was getting a bit more comfortable taking her shoes off and plopping on the couch. Morgan was the first to get to business as she sympathetically had her eyes locked on to your flat form laying in Norah's lap. "I really think there must be some kind of misunderstanding...Hunter straight up fainted when I told him he had a license this morning."

Norah merely laughed aloud at the idea of that, she imagined your large smile before toppling over in bliss thinking of her. "Fainted in excitement of course! You girls really don't know my nephew like I do, he's a quirky little guy like that!" Norah gave you an affectionate squeeze before she continued, "I mean really, he's been working up to this his whole life!" Norah had begun sliding you down her smooth thighs and calves before coming to her damp, not to mention sweltering, socked feet.

"I don't think that could possibly be true, he just signed up to move in here after all. He told us all about all these plans he had for the future!" Quinn stated, actually getting into this seeing as how wrong she thought your aunt was. Norah had begun pressing you firmly into the sole of each foot, forcing you to get a face-full of sweaty fabric that would've dripped onto the carpet if not for your body's desire to soak it all up.

"No, really! Ever since he was little he was always disguising himself as all sorts of useful little objects he somehow knew I needed, or magically getting himself stepped on or sat on. He really was like a little magnet for his favorite auntie!" Norah affectionately rubbed you deeper into her foot before satisfied with her work at drying her feet. Standing, she turned around and laid you flat on the couch before presenting her rotund booty to you. You watched her black spandex shorts stretch to their limit as Norah's ass widened as she sat. You shook feebly as it descended like a meteor onto your helpless body with a 'Whump!'. Norah bounced in place a bit saying, "Sorry, I really shouldn't have sat my sweaty behind on your nice couch, but don't worry, Hunter will help us out!" You screamed into an endless abyss that never produced a single sound at both Norah's words and her noxious tasting ass sweat that was seeping from her shorts onto you.

Quinn and Morgan exchanged nervous glances watching you while Avery nodded along approvingly. Truly Avery had no idea why her sisters were acting so investigative. Hunter signed the paperwork, what's their deal? Morgan spoke up again, "Really, Miss, I think this is all some big misunderstanding..." But Norah was quick to cut her off.

"Honey, I have dozens or maybe even hundreds of stories that would blow your mind! I'm not surprised you're a little confused but trust me when I say I just want what's best for him!" She felt a tiny itch in her ass and smeared it away with a wiggle on you before continuing, "Seriously, there was a time when he was little where he snuck into my dang suitcase masquerading as some kind of funny little rag!" Norah bellowed in laughter and fond remembrance shaking you beneath her, "He's sneaky too! I was none the wiser for quite a while, giving him more than enough use! I can't remember exactly how or why he eventually revealed himself but I'm sure he was as sad as I was!"

It seems you and Tracy never backtracking with Aunt Norah about her childhood tricks was really coming back to bite you. You swore if you ever got out of this you'd set the record straight. At this point Quinn and Morgan were feeling defeated and Quinn made one last plea, "If that's the case, why don't we just talk and ask him what he think-"

"Oh my is it getting dark out already! Yikes, I'd better get going girls! Thanks so much for taking care of Hunter for a bit but he's my responsibility now! I hope to see you girls around, maybe we could do that yoga sesh Avery?" Norah had peeled you from the couch and was out the door before Quinn could finish her thought or Morgan could protest. You swung in her grip as she took off jogging home. "Don't worry, Hunter. I know you. I won't let anyone take you from me." A chill ran down both your spines but for entirely different reasons. You just prayed your roommates wouldn't give up.

"It's okay Morgan, we'll figure something out..." Quinn patted a dejected Morgan on the back as they watched her run off. Morgan was wholly unconvinced. She saw that forged signature this morning and knew something was amiss.

Norah made good on her promises, using you as a shower wash cloth and couch cushion before getting to bed with you tucked deep in her warm and cozy yet suffocating cleavage. Eventually...

She needs more comfortable underwear, panties or bra for you.

115321122332.content:
As Isabella slid the documents towards you with her well manicured hand, she grinned at you, chewing on the gum in her mouth. She blew a bubble at you teasingly and you swear you could see the faint outline of a face before it burst and she drew it back into her mouth. Her full, plump lips closing and blocking the poor unfortunate man she was tormenting from your view.
“Don’t worry though Hunter, if any of these ones don’t suit you I’m sure I’d be able to find another girl who would suit your needs here,” she said this with a smile to Norah, who smiled back. What you noticed that Norah didn’t was the amused smirk as she looked back to you and continued. “I’ve got some good friends who love tiny guys like yourself and would treat you exactly how you deserve.”
With her thinly veiled threat in mind, you looked over the three documents that Isabella had laid out in front of you and none of them looked very appealing.
Aunt Norah was a bad choice, her forgetfulness and seeming eagerness to use you now that you had the general usage license made you reluctant to sign a license that gives her sole rights to use you. She would be very likely to mould you into something and then forget about it, and you really didn’t want to spend weeks at a time as her insole or underwear. That’s not even including the potential for using this newfound power over you to send you out on tiny guy jobs she’s struggling to fill at her job. The fact that this was also a permanent license, that could only be cancelled if both you and Norah agreed to it, was very off putting.
The second one you looked at was also a permanent license, not a good start. However, the name was not one you recognised, Becky Wallace. Maybe she was related to Quinn, her last name was Wallace. Maybe this Becky person would be as caring as Quinn seemed to be under her harsh exterior. But that wasn’t something you wanted to risk. You couldn’t sign your life away to a woman you didn’t even know.
That left the last license. Looking at it, it was only a year, which was better than the other two, although it couldn’t be cancelled even if both parties consented. Speaking of the other party, you began to question how Isabella had managed to make the license with the shortest time so unappealing when you read the name of your mother, Helen Woods. Helen, to put it lightly, would not be pleased to find out you had signed one of these contracts. You couldn’t be sure how she’d react exactly, but you could guess some form of punishment would be involved. She may decide to “give you exactly what you asked for” for the years duration of your license to teach you a lesson.
In the end you found it very difficult to choose anyone but your mother, her license was only a year and you were sure you’d be able to get Helen to see the truth of your situation eventually. You hoped.
Isabella raised an eyebrow in surprise when she saw you signing your mother’s license. She had expected you to refuse to sign any of them, you knew that much. She probably had contracts prepared for herself and her friend from the beach stashed somewhere that she’d probably have forced you to sign if you had refused. You were glad to have robbed her of that at least. Although you still felt, and could tell from how she was smirking at you she felt that, she had won.
Norah beamed behind you, “Aw Hunter, that’s so sweet of you to want to help out your mom like that.”
You turned to correct her and hopefully explain the situation as it really was, but before you could Isabella stealthily knocked over her pencil holder, which squished you, leaving you unable to talk.
“Sorry about that Hunter,” she smirked. “Anyway while you’re reforming I’ll explain how this works. Your usage license with your mother will last a year after which it will expire. Your mother will be notified a month before this happens and will have the option to come in and have me extend it. If she chooses not to your general usage license will kick back in and you’ll be available for other women to use to their heart’s content. So I’ll get this registered and send word to your mother via email.”
After laminating a card for both you and your mother, Isabella started helping Norah with her paperwork, a temporary usage license for one of the tiny guys she recruited for a job. You couldn’t get a word in over them talking about it to explain to Norah what was really going on and before long she was carrying you out of Isabella’s office, Isabella waving goodbye to you with a sadistic smile on her face.

Norah wrapped you around her wrist again and jogged back to your apartment.
Once there you could see two figures looking out the window. You could see Morgan, obviously the first home from work. The second one made your blood go cold, it was your mother, Helen Woods, and she looked angry, very angry.
Morgan looked incredibly nervous as your Aunt approached the apartment with you in her hand, having taken you off her wrist and given you some time to start reforming in her hand. You hadn’t fully reformed as Norah approached the front door and dropped you into Helen’s waiting hand alongside your laminated usage license cards. As Norah said her goodbyes, Helen replied with a goodbye without her eyes leaving your slowly reforming form. She looked deep in thought, her scowl changing to an expression that made it impossible for you to tell what she was thinking.
Helen followed Morgan back into the living room before speaking up,
“Morgan dear, could you give me and my son a moment alone? I need to discuss this with him in private.”
“Yeah sure, no problem Mrs Woods,” she gave you one last concerned glance before leaving the room. Leaving you, just finished reforming on your mother’s palm as she stared down at you in judgement.
“Hunter... would you care to explain to me how you could be so stupid to get yourself into this situation?” You felt like you would crumble under her angry gaze as she spoke to you. You had never seen her this angry before.
“W-well, It all started at my new job...” you started to explain.
“ I mean I thought I raised you better than this Hunter!” She shouted, interrupting you. “What, was life in the real world too difficult for you? You want to take the easy way out be becoming a thing instead of a person, is that it?”
“No that’s not...” you tried to defend yourself, explain what actually happened before you were interrupted again.
“I think I know what we’ll do here, I think I’ll give you exactly what you want. Show you what it’s really like to be someone’s property. After a year of being given exactly what you’ve asked for here maybe you’ll see what a mistake you’ve made here!” Her voice had calmed, changing from high volume shouting into that of a disappointed parent. As she finished speaking her hand closed around you, compacting you into a little ball before you could explain yourself.
“I know you’d come up with some sort of half-assed excuse so I don’t even want to hear it,” Helen said coldly.
Without another word to you she flattened you out while she took off her right shoe and dropped you in. You were facing upwards and were able to see her enormous socked foot, slightly damp with sweat descending and eventually blocking out the light as it entered the shoe and started to compact you even more as it took up all available space within the shoe. You were mostly underneath the heel of her foot, since she had just dropped you in , and you braced yourself as best you could in your flattened form.
You heard the muffled sound of your mother informing Morgan that she was going to take you home to decide what to do with you and then she took her first step towards the door.
Her first step, and the next few steps afterwards, compacted you further underneath her damp, musty sock. You were steadily spread out under her foot until you started to take a shape similar to her insole. The pressure on your body being exerted by every footfall, along with the constant movement, disorientated you and made you feel slightly nauseous.

Once your mother had left the apartment, she began walking towards her car. She seemed to be purposefully putting extra pressure on you now that she was outside, letting out some of her anger at, as she viewed it, your stupidity. She got in the car and started to drive off home. The car journey wasn’t as bad as her walking, but the increased heat in the car caused Helen to sweat a fair bit. This increased the humidity in her shoe and made the sock resting on top of you grow damper and some of that sweat began to soak through it and drip onto you. Your body greedily absorbed all the sweat that dripped onto you, and even started to leach the sweat from the sock resting on top of you. Gigi blushed faintly, and waved off your praise. “It was nothing, dude. Always happy to help. Actually, speaking of that…” She glanced knowingly at Brigitte.

Your boss cleared her throat. “Yeah, right, so…I’ve got an assignment for you two. Hunter and Gigi, from this day and onto the next few weeks, I want the two of you as a pair. Partners, if you will. Yesterday showed me that having a tiny on staff presents its own set of challenges, but also opportunities.”

“Ma’am?” You inquired, looking between her and Gigi. Gigi was smiling at you with understanding, and it was clear she had already been briefed on this partnership.

“Basically, I want you too patrolling the beach, but making use of Gigi’s special little vehicle.” Brigitte gestured to Gigi’s RC boat. For the first time since entering the room, you took note of how the RC boat had been painted bright red, and a little sticker of the Sanderson Beach logo was glued onto the hull of the boat. Brigitte continued. “Just like you saved Brady, the two of you can help out so many more people by working together. Am I understood?”

You blinked for a second, buying yourself time to process this information, but finally nodded. “O-of course, ma’am. Gigi and I will be the best partners on this whole beach!” You pumped your first excitedly, earning a giggle from Gigi, an approving nod from Brigitte, and a wary eyeroll from Quinn.

As your black-haired roommate handed you off to Gigi, you could’ve sworn you saw a brief look of apprehension (and maybe something more) cross her face, before it was immediately replaced with nonchalant apathy. Was she worried about your safety, Gigi’s reliability, or the fact that you wouldn’t be spending time with her? Regardless, Quinn then merely gave you a wave and left the office, leaving you to turn and look up at the gigantic smiling face of your new partner.

Cradling you delicately in her palm, Gigi and you said your goodbyes to Brigitte and then left her office, headed out towards the beach for your first day as patrol partners.

Once at the ocean’s edge, Gigi stepped out into the lapping waves and set her RC boat down, and then gently lowered you into the small plastic driver’s seat. Once in the seat, you realized that lying beside you was a replacement miniature megaphone to make up for the one you’d lost the other day. You tested it out by calling up to your new partner.

“Hey up there! Steer me well!” You joked, and Gigi laughed.

“I will, Hunter!” She twirled the RC controller around dexterously. “I’ve been piloting and driving these sorts of vehicles since I was four. They’ve always been kind of an obsession of mine.” She blushed lightly again, obviously a bit embarrassed of her dorky hobby.

You gave her a thumbs-up. “Sounds awesome to me! They’ll be calling us the dynamic duo before long!”

Gigi’s grin widened at your remark, and seeing her towering form illuminated by the shining morning light cast her in a radiant aura. It was like looking at a beautiful goddess. It wasn't as ludicrous as it was on Quinn, but the tight one-piece still clung to her decently sizable curves appealingly, and showed off a fair bit of skin. Admittedly, you were a bit anxious about this whole RC patrolling partnership, but if it had to be spent with a good-humored and gorgeous girl like Gigi, then it surely wouldn’t be too bad.

Right?

1153231221113.content:
Before you could ponder the potential issues that would come with your new assignment, you felt the RC boat surge into motion as Gigi manoeuvred it forward. She was sure to avoid most of the larger waves, displaying a skill at controlling the vehicle that you hadn’t had the chance to fully appreciate yesterday, during the emergency situation that you had last ridden on the boat in.
Although she did at one point steer the boat straight into a small cresting wave, which soaked you. You turned back to see her smirking and suppressing a laugh, and you could only chuckle to yourself, amused by the slightly older girl’s immature joke.

You spent the next thirty minutes sitting in Gigi’s boat as she drove it along the shore as she walked along the shore keeping pace with you. Aside from keeping an eye out for trouble you didn’t have a whole lot to do, it was pretty relaxing. You were too far out to be able to converse with Gigi while you patrolled, but you recall Bridgitte saying that if this partnership worked out she would look into getting a tiny sized walkie talkie for you to be able to communicate easier with Gigi, plus you were sure you would be able to get to know her better when you two stopped for lunch.
Just as you were starting to get a little bored, you noticed a teenage girl, maybe around fourteen or so, who seemed to be struggling to swim and was fairly far out to sea, you looked back to Gigi, and saw that she had noticed her as well. Gigi gave you a thumbs up and began steering you out towards the struggling teen.
The boat was pretty fast, so you made it out to her in record time. You couldn’t really make out a whole lot about her, as she was flailing and struggling in the water, all you could really make out was her long, red hair and pale skin.

As you approached you pulled out your megaphone.
“Are you ok? What’s wrong? I’m a lifeguard so I’m here to help,” you said these words with confidence, but you weren’t sure exactly how you would be able to help her.

“I- ugh,” she seemed to be struggling to keep her head above water and thus wasn’t really able to communicate what was wrong.

“Ok, if you’re struggling to swim just lay back and try to float, ok. Can you do that?”

The girl didn’t seem to acknowledge what you had said, but she shifted in the water and managed to, after a small struggle, start to float on her back. The motion of her body shifting like that so close to the boat rocked it slightly in the water, but you managed to keep your footing.

She seemed to be struggling to keep herself afloat and her plain, freckled face was contorted in pain. Her posture seemed off, she seemed unable to lie straight on her back, her skinny body was hunched slightly as she clutched her midsection. Now that she wasn’t struggling to keep her head above water she turned to speak to you, revealing a mouth filled with braces.

“H-hi... I’m Sandy, s-sorry for the trouble, I just got cramp and started to panic,” she blushed in embarrassment at the trivial reason that she was struggling. “I-It’s just that I didn’t want to come out this far... B-but my sister and her friends sorta forced me to come out this far or they said they’d tell a boy at school that I liked him.”

As she said this you followed her eyes to a group of girls sat on the beach laughing at her. They looked older than Sandy, you would guess around eighteen or nineteen, and in terms of looks they were a far cry from the scrawny girl you were helping. Each of the four girls were absolute knockouts, even from this distance.
One in particular grabbed your attention as you surveyed the group. She sat in the middle of the group, that fact along with the approval seeking looks that the others gave her as they chatted, which made you think that she was at the top of the pecking order. She was similar in appearance to Sandy, sharing her red hair and pale skin, which told you this was probably her sister, however the resemblance ended there. Her sister was a bombshell, she looked incredibly tall, with long, toned legs. You could see where her younger sister was thin and scrawny, this girl was curvy and toned. Her body looked sculpted by years of athletics, and her face was incredibly pretty, even if it was currently twisted in a mean spirited smirk.

You tore your gaze away from the gorgeous older sister back to Sandy.
“Hey, don’t worry about them. They sound like jerks. The best thing you can do right now is just breathe, the cramp will go away if you just relax and breathe.”

You coached Sandy’s breathing for a few minutes until the cramp went away. She gave you a small “T-thanks” before paddling back towards the shore. You could tell from the way she swam back to shore that she wasn’t a confident swimmer, and seeing her older sister and her friends teasing her made your blood boil. Gigi didn’t seem to notice the group of mean girls, as her gaze was fixed on the ocean, and you.
Putting your anger to the back of your mind you began to scan the rest of the beach as Gigi steered you further down the beach.

*****

You and Gigi had just patrolled all the way down to the left hand side of the beach with very few incidents, you had to be driven out to tell some kids to turn around as they were swimming too far out to sea, but that was about it.
You were patrolling back up to the middle of the beach when you spotted a commotion further out to sea. Looking to Gigi, she nodded before steering you out to check it out.
The section of water that you were speeding across wasn’t very deep, which meant that most people could stand up in it, with the water coming up to an average person’s stomach, but it was still quite a distance out and your boat moved much faster through the water than it would take Gigi to wade through it.

As you pulled closer to the source of the commotion you saw what was causing it. A familiar group of four girls were cruelly cackling as their leader repeatedly dunked another girl headfirst in the water over and over. As their victim was pulled up for air you recognised the gasping face of Sandy. Your blood boiled at the sight of this young girl being picked on like this. You knew how it felt to be picked on by someone massively larger and more powerful than yourself, so you sympathised with her.

As your boat zoomed towards the group you pulled out your megaphone.
“HEY!” You shouted out, loud enough for them to hear thanks to the megaphone. The four girls were momentarily distracted by your voice as they tried to figure out where it was coming from. As your boat drifted to a stop you continued. “Down here. Stop picking on people, the last thing this beach needs is a group of bullies.”

As they all turned to look down at you, their looks of confusion turned to amusement as they spotted you.

“Oh, lookie here girls, it’s a little shrimpy tiny. What’s the plan tough guy, you trying to help my little wuss of a sister?” The lead girl smirked down at you with her hands on her hips. She was an intimidating sight for sure, she was tall enough that the water lapped at her belly button, so you were at the same height as her lean stomach. You looked past her to see Sandy slipping away while her sister was distracted. Her sister noticed this and turned to watch her scamper off.
Satisfied that you had allowed Sandy to escape, you turned and tried to signal for Gigi to steer you away and surprisingly, Gigi noticed you and started to steer you out of there. A split second after the boat started to move, you struggled to keep your footing as it lifted from the water to the face of Sandy’s gorgeous, vindictive sister lifted the boat up, preventing your escape.
“Leaving so soon?” She pouted. “But you’ve already lost me my entertainment, it would be rude not to make it up to me.”

Looking around for any kind of escape from these gigantic bullies, you spotted Gigi wading her way towards you in the relatively shallow water. You sighed in relief knowing that your partner would be able to help you out of this situation.

1) Gigi talks the girls down and they thankfully recognise her authority as a lifeguard. They leave you alone.
2) The girls intimidate Gigi and she has to leave to go get help, but it takes a while, so the girls have free reign to torment you.
3) The girls intimidate Gigi and she has to leave to go get help. She returns later quickly with Bridgitte and Quinn, and they save you. Bridgitte decides you need some training to “toughen you up” before she can send you out with Gigi again.

11533.content:
“Simple task for day one, Hunter.” Brigitte explained, crossing her powerful arms in front of her chest. “I need you to walk the beach, up and down. It’s a two mile stretch that comprises Sanderson Beach…so it’ll take a while for someone of your size.”

You nodded, but were a little confused. “I can do that. Any particular reason?”

Brigitte smiled. “Of course, dude. I need you to help anyone who might be in need. Maybe someone is lost? Maybe someone lost someTHING? Maybe a kid wants a friend to play with for an hour? Maybe someone wants a quick lesson in proper swimming postures?” Brigitte shrugged casually. “It could really be anything. You never know.”

“Ah, okay. Thanks for the heads up!” You said. You were about to turn and end the conversation when your new boss held up her hand.

“Wait! One catch first, man.” She sat back down and leaned forward in her chair, steepling her fingers. “I need to hear you tell me exactly who you helped and what you did for them at the end of today’s shift. If you didn’t help out at least one person…” She made a cutting motion with her hand across her throat. “…the deal’s off. Got it?”

The slightest bit nervous, you nodded anyway. “O-of course! Got it!”

“Alright then!” Brigitte beamed, then turned her expression on Quinn. “Quinn, girl, go ahead out. Drop Hunter off when you make it to the middle tower. He’s on his own from there.”

Quinn dipped her head almost imperceptibly. “Of course. See you later.” With that, your black-haired roommate turned on her heel and strode out of the door. You clung to her thumb to avoid falling off her palm, especially as the flat pavement gave way to the sandy dunes of Sanderson Beach.

The sun was beating down like crazy today, and the temperature was quite sweltering. Thankfully, you’d lathered up in a bit of sunscreen earlier, and because of your small size, the slightest breeze felt like a storming wind. Thus, you kept cool relatively easily. Still, you were surprised how packed the beach was for still being before noon. Apparently, everyone else was willing to brave the weather for a nice and relaxing day.

When Quinn reached the base of the middle tower, she gently lowered you to the ground. With relief, you found the sand to be just firm enough to hold your weight without you sinking in. It was still an overwhelming experience to look out from the ground all around the beach. It was like a vast desert wonderland…or perhaps wasteland was the better term.

Glancing up at Quinn, you shielded your eyes from the sun and gave her a thumbs up. Surprisingly, Quinn returned your thumbs up, before sliding on sunglasses and scaling the ladder up to the top of the middle lifeguard tower. You were momentarily distracted (for the third time in less than an hour) by the sight of Quinn’s magnificently shapely butt bounce as she climbed the ladder, and then you began walking.

Though it wasn’t much more than a speck in the distance, you could make out the right tower. If you had to guess, it was a little less than a mile away. Once reaching that tower, your plan was to double back, pass the middle tower, and then hit the left tower. You would then have completed one and a half laps across the beach, and taking your size into account, it would probably be time to go home by then. Hopefully you would have helped at least one person by then, and maybe even more.

Your first five minutes of walking were simple and easy. Because of your size, walking across the sand was more like walking on normal ground, just with a few small hills and valleys every so often. It wasn’t too bad, all things considered, though it was a little disheartening to turn around and see the comparably small distance you’d covered from the middle tower in that time. Still, your whole life had prepared you for this, and you had more than enough stamina and endurance to keep up a good pace.

The first troubling encounter happened after fifteen minutes. You had been walking in the direction of a woman who seemed nervous, and she was glancing around. Inferring that she was in need of a lifeguard such as yourself, you doubled your speed towards the woman, growing closer by the second. However, this single-minded drive to reach the woman had the obvious downside of blinding you to everything else in your peripheral.

As such, you were caught completely off guard when a young girl came sprinting by, laughing and giggling. Like a truck slamming into you, the little girl’s foot crashed down onto you, her petite heel digging into your body. In the blink of an eye, you were crushed flat. The girl’s weight also indented the sand around your body, leaving a curved imprint in the ground. When she took another step and raced off, you were left stuck to the ground by the pressure, though thankfully not too crushed.

That was only slightly relieving, as a second later, the girl’s titanic mother strolled above you, her giant feet on either side of you. She was calling out to her daughter in an amused tone, warning her to slow down. While you were still reforming, the mother, never once looking down, rolled her eyes at her daughter’s antics and then unfurled a towel from her bag. She then began to spread the towel out…directly over you.

Spurred on by this horrifying sight, you focused all your efforts and popped back into 3D, but you were a millisecond too late. The towel, a large, fluffy thing decorated in flower patterns, descending, falling over all of the ground around you like a veil from above. It touched the sand, forcing you onto your stomach, but thankfully not squishing you. You were still able to crawl along your stomach.

And, crawl you did. You dashed madly along the coarse sands, scrambling like a demon-possessed crab. You had no idea where you were going in the darkness, but finally a sliver of light revealed itself. Pushing out into the light, you popped out from under the towel, and basked in the sunlight. A moment of reflection revealed that you had lost your shirt, probably when scrambling under the towel. It must’ve ripped off. At least you still had your red swim trunks.

Looking back, you saw the woman who had inadvertently thrown such a wrench into your day settle down onto her towel and pull out a novel to read. Looking away from her, you glumly saw the woman you had been intending to help all along graciously receiving aid from Quinn, of all people. In reality, you were still no more than fifty yards from the middle tower, and so your roommate had taken it upon herself to help out the nervous woman. She had no clue she’d robbed you of your goal.

She also had no clue that you were so close, a fact evidenced by how close she came to stomping on you as she walked back towards the tower. You had tried to call out to her, only for your voice to be drowned out by a cawing seagull. As such, you had dove to the side to avoid her powerful stride, and watched as she sauntered on by, presumably off to help someone else in need.

It was beginning to dawn on you that perhaps signing on to be a lifeguard was a bad idea, but you were far from ready to throw in the towel yet. You had to prove yourself to Brigitte and Quinn that you were capable of doing this. You had to prove to YOURSELF that you were a strong and dependable tiny that people could rely on.

You walked for another thirty minutes, never once giving up on scanning your surroundings for people in need or threats to your safety. Twice more you spotted someone who looked like they could use assistance, but after having to dodge someone stepping on you, found that Quinn had made it to them first. It was beginning to tick you off, but you were angrier at fate for being cruel than your roommate for just doing her job.

Eventually, you came upon a group of college-aged girls rounding up enough volunteers to start a volleyball game. None of them looked like they needed help, so you kept walking, but you were quite distracted by just how beautiful the girls were, and how revealing their swimsuits were too. There were seven gorgeous giantesses gathered on the sandy court by the volleyball net, and they seemed to be looking for one more to join them.

It was then that you heard pounding footsteps coming from behind you. Eyes widening in panic, you whirled around to face another girl who was running towards you at top speed. She had an excited expression on her face, and her eyes were locked fully on the volleyball group behind you. You realized that she was probably going to join them as their eighth player. You also realized how oblivious this girl was to your existence, and how close her pounding feet were getting.

Tensing up in a panic, you willed yourself to dodge out of the way of her slamming feet and find safety. How successful are you?

That was hardly a pressing concern though, as the woman shuffled over to the second bag, sliding her knees along the towel. Not wanting to be steamrolled by her, you scrambled out of the way, just barely avoiding her. Recovering from that, you vaguely took note of the woman retrieve a pair of sunglasses from the second bag, smile victoriously, and put them on her face. She then shuffled back towards you, but you were far enough away that her legs and feet weren’t close to crushing you. Feeling safe, you rolled onto your back and pushed yourself up to your feet. Clearing your throat in preparation to talk to this woman and ask if she needed help, you paused to catch your breath and turned around.
